Column.name: Notes
Column.value: <Script Name="Set Current Diagram Objects Style" Type="Internal" Language="VBScript"/>

Column.name: Script
Column.value:
' Script to update style for all diagram objects of a specific type. ' ' Copyright (c) 2011-2014 Armstrong Process Group, Inc. All rights reserved. www.aprocessgroup.com
const STYLE_DELIMITER = ";" const STYLE_ASSIGNMENT = "="
sub SetCurrentDiagramObjectsStyle(elementMetaType, updateStyleList)
dim theDiagram as EA.Diagram
set theDiagram = Repository.GetCurrentDiagram
theDiagram.Update
SetDiagramObjectsStyle theDiagram, elementMetaType, updateStyleList
theDiagram.Update
end sub
sub SetDiagramObjectsStyle( theDiagram, elementMetaType, updateStyleList)
dim diagramObject as EA.DiagramObject dim diagramElement as EA.Element dim elementID
for each diagramObject in theDiagram.DiagramObjects
elementID = diagramObject.ElementID
set diagramElement = Repository.GetElementByID(elementID)
if diagramElement.metaType = elementMetaType then
SetDiagramObjectStyleList diagramObject, updateStyleList
diagramObject.Update
end if
next
Repository.ReloadDiagram theDiagram.DiagramID
end sub
sub SetDiagramObjectStyleList( diagramObject, updateStyleList)
dim updateStyleArray dim updateStyle
updateStyleArray = Split(updateStyleList, STYLE_DELIMITER)
for each updateStyle in updateStyleArray SetDiagramObjectStyle diagramObject, updateStyle next
end sub
sub SetDiagramObjectStyle( diagramObject, updateStyle)
diagramObject.Style = UpdateStyleList( diagramObject.Style, updateStyle)
end sub
function UpdateStyleList( styleList, updateStyle)
dim updateStylePartArray dim updateStyleName dim styleArray dim styleIndex dim styleString dim styleFound
updateStylePartArray = Split(updateStyle, STYLE_ASSIGNMENT)
updateStyleName = updateStylePartArray(0)
styleArray = Split(styleList, STYLE_DELIMITER)
styleIndex = 0 styleFound = false
for each styleString in styleArray
if InStr( styleString, updateStyleName & STYLE_ASSIGNMENT) then
styleString = updateStyle
styleArray(styleIndex) = styleString
styleFound = true
end if
styleIndex = styleIndex + 1
next
styleList = Join(styleArray, STYLE_DELIMITER)
if not( styleFound) then styleList = styleList & updateStyle & STYLE_DELIMITER end if
UpdateStyleList = styleList
end function
sub SetDiagramObjectCustomStyle( diagram, diagramObject, customStyleList)
dim duid 'as String dim customStyleID 'as String
duid = GetStyleSetting( diagramObject.Style, "DUID")
customStyleID = "OPTIONS_" & duid
diagram.StyleEx = UpdateStyleList( diagram.StyleEx, customStyleID & "=" & customStyleList)
end sub
function GetStyleSetting( styleList, styleName)
dim styleArray dim styleSetting dim styleString dim styleFound
styleArray = Split(styleList, STYLE_DELIMITER)
styleFound = false
for each styleString in styleArray
if InStr( styleString, styleName & STYLE_ASSIGNMENT) then
styleSetting = Mid( styleString, InStr( styleString, STYLE_ASSIGNMENT) + 1)
styleFound = true
end if
next
if not( styleFound) then styleSetting = vbNullString end if
GetStyleSetting = styleSetting
end function

' Script to change fill color of elements on a diagram based on an array of rules (conditions) ' ' Copyright (c) 2011-2015 Armstrong Process Group, Inc. All rights reserved. www.aprocessgroup.com
!INC Local Scripts.EAConstants-VBScript
sub ChangeDiagramElementColor(ruleArray, colorArray)
dim currentDiagram as EA.Diagram dim diagramObject as EA.DiagramObject dim backgroundColor dim elementID dim element as EA.Element dim index dim rule
set currentDiagram = Repository.GetCurrentDiagram()
if not currentDiagram is nothing then
Repository.SaveDiagram currentDiagram.DiagramID
for each diagramObject in currentDiagram.DiagramObjects
elementID = diagramObject.ElementID
set element = Repository.GetElementByID( elementID)
for index = 0 to UBound(ruleArray)
rule = ruleArray(index) 'Session.Prompt "inside array " & element.Name, promptOK 'Session.Prompt "inside array " & rule, promptOK 'if eval( rule) then Session.Prompt "inside array " & element.Name, promptOK backgroundColor = colorArray(index) element.SetAppearance 1, 0, backgroundColor element.SetAppearance 255,0,backgroundColor element.Update 'end if
next
next
Repository.ReloadDiagram currentDiagram.DiagramID
else Session.Prompt "This script requires a diagram to be visible", promptOK end if
end sub

Column.name: Notes
Column.value: <Script Name="Create Diagram Legend" Type="Internal" Language="VBScript"/>

Column.name: Script
Column.value:
' Script to create a legend based on an array of rules (conditions)
' Copyright (c) 2011-2015 Armstrong Process Group, Inc. All rights reserved. www.aprocessgroup.com
!INC Local Scripts.EAConstants-VBScript
const LEGEND_SUBTYPE = 76 const LEGEND_ELEMENT_NAME = "Capability Legend"
sub CreateDiagramLegend(legendName, valueArray, colorArray)
dim currentDiagram as EA.Diagram dim diagramPackageID dim diagramPackage as EA.Package dim legendElement as EA.Element dim legendGUID dim legendObject as EA.DiagramObject dim backgroundColor dim elementID dim element as EA.Element dim index dim value dim color dim legendXrefProperties dim sqlString
set currentDiagram = Repository.GetCurrentDiagram()
if not currentDiagram is nothing then
Repository.SaveDiagram currentDiagram.DiagramID
diagramPackageID = currentDiagram.PackageID
set diagramPackage = Repository.GetPackageByID(diagramPackageID)
set legendElement = diagramPackage.Elements.AddNew(LEGEND_ELEMENT_NAME, "Text")
legendElement.Subtype = LEGEND_SUBTYPE
legendElement.Update
legendGUID = legendElement.ElementGUID
set legendObject = currentDiagram.DiagramObjects.AddNew(LEGEND_ELEMENT_NAME, "")
legendObject.DiagramID = currentDiagram.DiagramID legendObject.ElementID = legendElement.ElementID
legendObject.left = 10 legendObject.top = -350 legendObject.right = legendObject.left + 100 legendObject.bottom = legendObject.top - 150
legendObject.Update
currentDiagram.Update
legendXrefProperties = ""
for index = 0 to UBound(valueArray)
value = valueArray(index) color = colorArray(index)
legendXrefProperties = legendXrefProperties & "@PROP=@NAME=" & value & "@ENDNAME;@TYPE=LEGEND_OBJECTSTYLE@ENDTYPE;" legendXrefProperties = legendXrefProperties & "@VALU=#Back_Ground_Color#=" & color & ";#Pen_Color#=0;#Pen_Size#=1;#Legend_Type#=LEGEND_OBJECTSTYLE;@ENDVALU;" legendXrefProperties = legendXrefProperties & "@PRMT=" & index & "@ENDPRMT;@ENDPROP;"
next
legendXrefProperties = legendXrefProperties & "@PROP=@NAME=" & legendName & "@ENDNAME;@TYPE=LEGEND_STYLE_SETTINGS@ENDTYPE;@VALU=#TITLE#=" & legendName & ";@ENDVALU;@PRMT=@ENDPRMT;@ENDPROP;"
sqlString = "INSERT INTO t_xref (`XrefID`, `Name`, `Type`, `Visibility`, `Partition`, `Description`, `Client`, `Supplier`) VALUES (" sqlString = sqlString & """" & GetNewGUID & """, " sqlString = sqlString & """CustomProperties"", " sqlString = sqlString & """element property"", " sqlString = sqlString & """Public"", " sqlString = sqlString & "0, " sqlString = sqlString & """" & legendXrefProperties & """, " sqlString = sqlString & """" & legendGUID & """, " sqlString = sqlString & """<none>"")"
Repository.CreateOutputTab "test" Repository.WriteOutput "test", sqlString, 0
Repository.Execute sqlString
Repository.ReloadDiagram currentDiagram.DiagramID
end if
end sub
function GetNewGUID() GetNewGUID = Left(CreateObject("Scriptlet.TypeLib").Guid,38) end function

Column.name: Notes
Column.value: <Script Name="Dump Diagrams To File" Type="Internal" Language="VBScript"/>

Column.name: Script
Column.value:
option explicit
' Script to create images of all diagrams in a package and write them to the filing system. ' ' Copyright (c) 2011-2014 Armstrong Process Group, Inc. All rights reserved. www.aprocessgroup.com
Dim project as EA.Project Dim folderName Dim PACKAGE_OBJECT_TYPE Dim topLevelPackage as EA.Package Dim imageFileExt Dim packageLevel Dim filterDiagramType
PACKAGE_OBJECT_TYPE = 5 imageFileExt = "jpg" packageLevel = 0
' User modifiable variables.
folderName = "C:\Users\User\Documents\DiagramImages"
filterDiagramType = "" ' All 'filterDiagramType = "Activity" 'filterDiagramType = "Analysis" 'filterDiagramType = "Component" 'filterDiagramType = "Custom" 'filterDiagramType = "Deployment" 'filterDiagramType = "Logical" 'filterDiagramType = "Sequence" 'filterDiagramType = "Statechart" 'filterDiagramType = "Use Case"
sub UpdatePackageClasses()
Session.Output( "Dump Diagrams to Filing System v1.0" ) Session.Output( "===================================" )
dim theElement as EA.Element
set project = Repository.GetProjectInterface()
set theElement = Repository.GetTreeSelectedObject()
if not theElement is nothing and theElement.ObjectType = PACKAGE_OBJECT_TYPE then
set topLevelPackage = theElement
DumpPackage packageLevel, topLevelPackage
else
MsgBox( "This script requires a package be selected in the Project Browser." & chr(10) & _ "Please select a package in the Project Browser and try again." )
end if
Session.Output( "Done!" )
end sub
sub DumpPackage ( packageLevel, thePackage )
dim currentPackage as EA.Package dim childPackage as EA.Package
set currentPackage = thePackage
packageLevel = packageLevel + 1
'Session.Output( currentPackage.Name & " (PackageID=" & currentPackage.PackageID & ")" )
DumpDiagrams packageLevel, currentPackage, "" DumpElements packageLevel, currentPackage, ""
for each childPackage in currentPackage.Packages DumpPackage packageLevel, childPackage next
end sub
sub DumpDiagrams ( packageLevel, theObject, elementNameQualifier)
dim currentDiagram as EA.Diagram dim diagramType dim diagramDate dim fileName
for each currentDiagram in theObject.Diagrams
diagramType = currentDiagram.Type
if filterDiagramType = "" or ( filterDiagramType <> "" and filterDiagramType = diagramType ) then
diagramDate = GetDateLabel( currentDiagram.ModifiedDate)
fileName = topLevelPackage.Name
if elementNameQualifier <> "" then fileName = fileName & elementNameQualifier end if
fileName = fileName & "." & theObject.Name fileName = fileName & "." & currentDiagram.Name fileName = fileName & "." & diagramType filename = fileName & "." & diagramDate fileName = filename & "." & imageFileExt
fileName = ConvertIllegalChars( fileName)
fileName = folderName & "\" & fileName
project.PutDiagramImageToFile currentDiagram.DiagramGUID, fileName, 1
Repository.CloseDiagram currentDiagram.DiagramID
end if
Session.Output( fileName )
next
end sub
sub DumpElements ( packageLevel, theObject, elementNameQualifier )
dim currentElement as EA.Element dim prevQualifier
prevQualifier = elementNameQualifier
elementNameQualifier = elementNameQualifier & "." & theObject.Name
'session.output( "-> Qualifier: " & elementNameQualifier)
for each currentElement in theObject.Elements
DumpDiagrams packageLevel, currentElement, elementNameQualifier DumpElements packageLevel, currentElement, elementNameQualifier
next
elementNameQualifier = prevQualifier
end sub
function GetDateLabel( aDate)
dim yearPart dim monthPart dim dayPart
yearPart = DatePart("yyyy", aDate)
monthPart = DatePart( "m", aDate) monthPart = String( 2 - Len( monthPart ),"0" ) & monthPart
dayPart = DatePart( "d", aDate) dayPart = String( 2 - Len( dayPart ),"0" ) & dayPart
GetDateLabel = yearPart & monthPart & dayPart
end function
function ConvertIllegalChars( fileName)
fileName = Replace( fileName, " ", "_") fileName = Replace( fileName, "\", "_") fileName = Replace( fileName, "/", "_") fileName = Replace( fileName, ":", "_") fileName = Replace( fileName, "*", "_")
ConvertIllegalChars = fileName
end function
UpdatePackageClasses

Column.value:
option explicit
' Script to clear the make all composition relationships unidirectional on an open diagram. ' ' Copyright (c) 2011-2016: Sparx Services North America. All rights reserved. www.sparxsystems.us
Dim project as EA.Project
sub Start()
Session.Output( "Make Compositions Unidirectional v1.0" ) Session.Output( "=====================================" )
dim theDiagram as EA.Diagram
set project = Repository.GetProjectInterface()
set theDiagram = Repository.GetCurrentDiagram
if not theDiagram is nothing then
MakeCompositionsUnidirectional theDiagram
else
MsgBox( "This script requires a diagram be opened." & chr(10) & _ "Please open a diagram from the Project Browser and try again." )
end if
Session.Output( "Done!" )
end sub
sub MakeCompositionsUnidirectional ( theDiagram )
dim aDiagramLink as EA.DiagramLink dim connectorID dim aConnector as EA.Connector dim newTag as EA.ConnectorTag
for each aDiagramLink in theDiagram.DiagramLinks
connectorID = aDiagramLink.ConnectorID
set aConnector = Repository.GetConnectorByID( connectorID)
aConnector.ClientEnd.Navigable = "Navigable" aConnector.ClientEnd.Update
aConnector.SupplierEnd.Navigable = "Unspecified" aConnector.SupplierEnd.Update
'aConnector.Update
next
Repository.ReloadDiagram( theDiagram.DiagramID )
end sub
Start

' Script to move the selected elements on a diagram into the same package (in the browser) as the diagram. ' ' Copyright (c) 2011-2016: Sparx Services North America. All rights reserved. www.sparxsystems.us
Dim project as EA.Project
sub Start()
dim diagram as EA.Diagram
set project = Repository.GetProjectInterface()
set diagram = Repository.GetCurrentDiagram
if not diagram is nothing then
RelocateDiagramElements diagram
end if
end sub
sub RelocateDiagramElements( diagram)
dim diagramObject as EA.DiagramObject dim diagramPackageID dim elementID dim element as EA.Element
diagramPackageID = diagram.PackageID
for each diagramObject in diagram.SelectedObjects
elementID = diagramObject.ElementID
set element = Repository.GetElementByID(elementID)
element.PackageID = diagramPackageID
element.Update
next
end sub
Start

sub RecursiveModelDumpExample()
Session.Output( "Show Package Info" ) Session.Output( "=======================================" )
' Iterate through all models in the project
dim currentModel as EA.Package
for each currentModel in Repository.Models
' Recursively process this package
DumpPackage "", currentModel
next
Session.Output( "Done!" )
end sub
sub DumpPackage ( indent, thePackage )
dim currentPackage as EA.Package
set currentPackage = thePackage
Session.Output( indent & currentPackage.Name & " (PackageID=" & currentPackage.PackageID & ")" )
DumpElements indent & " ", currentPackage
dim childPackage as EA.Package
for each childPackage in currentPackage.Packages DumpPackage indent & " ", childPackage next
end sub
sub DumpElements ( indent, thePackage )
dim currentPackage as EA.Package
set currentPackage = thePackage
dim currentElement as EA.Element
for each currentElement in currentPackage.Elements Session.Output( indent & "::" & currentElement.Name & _ " (" & currentElement.Type & _ ", ID=" & currentElement.ElementID & ")" ) next
end sub
RecursiveModelDumpExample

' Script to change fill color of elements on a diagram based on an array of rules (conditions) ' ' Copyright (c) 2011-2014 Armstrong Process Group, Inc. All rights reserved. www.aprocessgroup.com
!INC Local Scripts.EAConstants-VBScript
sub ChangeElementColor(ruleArray, colorArray)
dim currentDiagram as EA.Diagram dim diagramObject as EA.DiagramObject dim backgroundColor dim elementID dim element as EA.Element dim index dim rule
set currentDiagram = Repository.GetCurrentDiagram()
if not currentDiagram is nothing then
Repository.SaveDiagram currentDiagram.DiagramID
for each diagramObject in currentDiagram.DiagramObjects
elementID = diagramObject.ElementID
set element = Repository.GetElementByID( elementID)
for index = 0 to UBound(ruleArray)
rule = ruleArray(index)
if eval( rule) then backgroundColor = colorArray(index) diagramObject.Style = "BCol=" & backgroundColor & ";" diagramObject.Update end if
next
next
Repository.ReloadDiagram currentDiagram.DiagramID
else Session.Prompt "This script requires a diagram to be visible", promptOK end if
end sub

Column.name: Script
Column.value:
' Script to update style of all connectors on a diagram. ' ' Copyright (c) 2011-2014 Armstrong Process Group, Inc. All rights reserved. www.aprocessgroup.com
const STYLE_DELIMITER = ";" const STYLE_ASSIGNMENT = "="
sub SetCurrentDiagramConnectorLineStyle(updateStyleList)
dim theDiagram as EA.Diagram
set theDiagram = Repository.GetCurrentDiagram
theDiagram.Update
SetDiagramConnectorLineStyle theDiagram, updateStyleList
theDiagram.Update
end sub
sub SetDiagramConnectorLineStyle( theDiagram, updateStyleList)
dim diagramLink as EA.DiagramLink dim updateStyleArray dim updateStyle
updateStyleArray = Split(updateStyleList, STYLE_DELIMITER)
for each diagramLink in theDiagram.DiagramLinks
for each updateStyle in updateStyleArray SetDiagramLinkStyle diagramLink, updateStyle next
diagramLink.Update
next
Repository.ReloadDiagram theDiagram.DiagramID
end sub
sub SetDiagramLinkStyle( diagramLink, updateStyle)
dim updateStylePartArray dim updateStyleName dim lineStyleList dim lineStyleArray dim lineStyleIndex dim lineStyle dim styleFound
updateStylePartArray = Split(updateStyle, STYLE_ASSIGNMENT)
updateStyleName = updateStylePartArray(0)
lineStyleList = diagramLink.Style
lineStyleArray = Split(lineStyleList, STYLE_DELIMITER)
lineStyleIndex = 0 styleFound = false
for each lineStyle in lineStyleArray
if InStr( lineStyle, updateStyleName & STYLE_ASSIGNMENT) then
lineStyle = updateStyle
lineStyleArray(lineStyleIndex) = lineStyle
styleFound = true
end if
lineStyleIndex = lineStyleIndex + 1
next
lineStyleList = Join(lineStyleArray, STYLE_DELIMITER)
if not( styleFound) then lineStyleList = lineStyleList & updateStyle & STYLE_DELIMITER end if
diagramLink.Style = lineStyleList
end sub

Column.name: Notes
Column.value: <Script Name="Create Capability Hierarchy Diagram" Type="Internal" Language="VBScript"/>

Column.name: Script
Column.value:
option explicit
!INC Local Scripts.EAConstants-VBScript !INC Diagram Script Utilities.Set Current Diagram Objects Style
const HIERARCHY_TAB = "Capability Hierarchy Diagram"
sub OnProjectBrowserScript()
' Get the type of element selected in the Project Browser dim treeSelectedType treeSelectedType = Repository.GetTreeSelectedItemType()
' Handling Code: Uncomment any types you wish this script to support ' NOTE: You can toggle comments on multiple lines that are currently ' selected with [CTRL]+[SHIFT]+[C]. select case treeSelectedType
'case otElement ' Code for when an element is selected ' dim theElement as EA.Element ' set theElement = Repository.GetTreeSelectedObject() ' ' CreateNestedHierarchyDiagram theElement, "ValueStream"
case otPackage ' ' Code for when a package is selected dim thePackage as EA.Package set thePackage = Repository.GetTreeSelectedObject()
CreateNestedHierarchyDiagram thePackage, "Class" ' ' case otDiagram ' ' Code for when a diagram is selected ' dim theDiagram as EA.Diagram ' set theDiagram = Repository.GetTreeSelectedObject() ' ' case otAttribute ' ' Code for when an attribute is selected ' dim theAttribute as EA.Attribute ' set theAttribute = Repository.GetTreeSelectedObject() ' ' case otMethod ' ' Code for when a method is selected ' dim theMethod as EA.Method ' set theMethod = Repository.GetTreeSelectedObject()
case else ' Error message Session.Prompt "This script does not support items of this type.", promptOK
end select
end sub
sub CreateNestedHierarchyDiagram( topElement, subElementMetaType)
dim subElement as EA.Element dim packageObject as EA.DiagramObject dim packageBoundary as EA.Element dim heatMapDiagram as EA.Diagram dim packageIndex dim packageTop dim packageVertOffset dim packageHorizOffset dim packageVertSpace dim packageHorizSpace dim packageWidth dim packageHeight dim packageElementColumnCount dim packageColumnIndex dim maxDiagramHeight dim relatedElementList dim anElement as EA.Element dim elementBoundary as EA.Element dim elementObject as EA.DiagramObject dim elementIndex dim elementVertOffset dim elementHorizOffset dim elementVertSpace dim elementWidth dim elementHeight dim elementColumnIndex dim elementHorizSpace dim elementsPerColumn dim elementTaggedValue as EA.TaggedValue dim boundaryTaggedValue as EA.TaggedValue
Repository.CreateOutputTab HIERARCHY_TAB Repository.EnsureOutputVisible HIERARCHY_TAB
Repository.WriteOutput HIERARCHY_TAB, "Creating heat map diagram for Element '" & topElement.Name & "'...", 0
set heatMapDiagram = topElement.Diagrams.AddNew( "Heat Map", "Package")
heatMapDiagram.Update
SetDiagramStyle heatMapDiagram, "HideEStereo=1"
Repository.OpenDiagram(heatMapDiagram.DiagramID)
elementVertOffset = 20 elementHorizOffset = 10 elementVertSpace = 10 elementWidth = 75 elementHeight = 45 elementHorizSpace = 10
packageIndex = 0 packageColumnIndex = 0 packageHorizOffset = 10 packageHorizSpace = 10 packageVertOffset = 10 packageVertSpace = 10 packageElementColumnCount = 3 packageTop = -packageVertOffset maxDiagramHeight = 400
packageWidth = packageElementColumnCount * ( elementWidth + elementHorizSpace ) + elementHorizOffset
for each subElement in topElement.Elements Repository.WriteOutput HIERARCHY_TAB, "Meta type is '" & subElement.MetaType, 0 if subElement.MetaType = subElementMetaType then
Repository.WriteOutput HIERARCHY_TAB, "Adding diagram object for Element '" & subElement.Name & "'...", 0
set packageBoundary = topElement.Elements.AddNew(subElement.Name, "Boundary")
packageBoundary.Update
set packageObject = heatMapDiagram.DiagramObjects.AddNew(subElement.Name,"")
set relatedElementList = GetElementRelatedElements(subElement, "Aggregation", "Class")
packageHeight = ( Int( ( relatedElementList.Count - 1 ) / packageElementColumnCount ) + 1 ) * ( elementHeight + elementVertSpace ) + elementVertOffset
packageObject.DiagramID = heatMapDiagram.DiagramID packageObject.ElementID = packageBoundary.ElementID
packageObject.left = packageHorizOffset + packageColumnIndex * ( packageWidth + packageHorizSpace) packageObject.top = packageTop packageObject.right = packageObject.left + packageWidth packageObject.bottom = packageObject.top - packageHeight
if packageObject.bottom < -maxDiagramHeight then
packageColumnIndex = packageColumnIndex + 1 packageTop = -packageVertOffset
packageObject.left = packageHorizOffset + packageColumnIndex * ( packageWidth + packageHorizSpace) packageObject.top = packageTop packageObject.right = packageObject.left + packageWidth packageObject.bottom = packageObject.top - packageHeight
end if
packageObject.Update
packageTop = packageTop - (packageHeight + packageVertSpace)
packageIndex = packageIndex + 1
elementIndex = 0
for each anElement in relatedElementList.Items
Repository.WriteOutput HIERARCHY_TAB, "- Adding diagram object for Element '" & anElement.Name & "'...", 0
elementsPerColumn = Int(( packageHeight - elementVertOffset ) / ( elementHeight + elementVertSpace))
set elementBoundary = subElement.Elements.AddNew(anElement.name,"Boundary")
elementBoundary.Status = anElement.Status 'elementBoundary.Stereotype = anElement.Stereotype elementBoundary.Properties.Item("BorderStyle").Value = "Solid"
for each elementTaggedValue in anElement.TaggedValues
set boundaryTaggedValue = elementBoundary.TaggedValues.AddNew(elementTaggedValue.Name,"")
boundaryTaggedValue.Value = elementTaggedValue.Value
boundaryTaggedValue.Update
next
elementBoundary.Update
set elementObject = heatMapDiagram.DiagramObjects.AddNew(anElement.Alias,"")
elementColumnIndex = Int(elementIndex / elementsPerColumn)
elementObject.DiagramID = heatMapDiagram.DiagramID elementObject.ElementID = elementBoundary.ElementID
elementObject.left = packageObject.left + elementHorizOffset + elementColumnIndex * (elementWidth + elementHorizSpace) elementObject.top = packageObject.top - ((elementIndex - Int( elementIndex / elementsPerColumn ) * elementsPerColumn) * (elementHeight + elementVertSpace)) - elementVertOffset elementObject.right = elementObject.left + elementWidth elementObject.bottom = elementObject.top - elementHeight
elementObject.Update
elementIndex = elementIndex + 1
next
heatMapDiagram.Update
Repository.ReloadDiagram(heatMapDiagram.DiagramID)
end if next
Repository.WriteOutput HIERARCHY_TAB, "Finished!", 0
end sub
function GetElementRelatedElements( element, connectorMetaType, relatedElementMetaType)
dim connector as EA.Connector dim relatedElementList dim relatedElementID dim relatedElement as EA.Element
set relatedElementList = CreateObject("Scripting.Dictionary")
Repository.WriteOutput HIERARCHY_TAB, element.Name & " element.Connectors Count is " & element.Connectors.Count, 0
for each connector in element.Connectors
Repository.WriteOutput HIERARCHY_TAB, "connector Type = " & connector.MetaType & " Metatype " & connectorMetaType, 0 'Repository.WriteOutput HIERARCHY_TAB, "connector.MetaType = " & connector.MetaType, 0 'Repository.WriteOutput HIERARCHY_TAB, element.Name & " has Connectors of type " & connector.MetaType, 0 if connector.MetaType = connectorMetaType then
if connector.ClientID = element.ElementID then relatedElementID = connector.SupplierID else relatedElementID = connector.ClientID end if
set relatedElement = Repository.GetElementByID(relatedElementID)
'Repository.WriteOutput HIERARCHY_TAB, "relatedElementID = " & relatedElementID, 0 Repository.WriteOutput HIERARCHY_TAB, "relatedElement.Name = " & relatedElement.Name, 0 'Repository.WriteOutput HIERARCHY_TAB, "relatedElement.MetaType = " & relatedElement.MetaType, 0
if relatedElement.MetaType = relatedElementMetaType then relatedElementList.Add relatedElement.ElementGUID, relatedElement end if
end if next
set GetElementRelatedElements = relatedElementList
end function
OnProjectBrowserScript
sub Test(elementGUID)
dim anElement as EA.Element set anElement = Repository.GetElementByGuid(elementGUID)
CreateNestedHierarchyDiagram anElement
end sub

All rights reserved. www.sparxsystems.us ' Script Name: Apply Capability Maturity heatMap ' Author: SNNA ' Purpose: ' Script to change fill color of elements on a diagram based the taggedValueName Increments that defines values between 0 and 5. '(0) = "None" '(1) = "Initial" '(2) = "UnderDevelopment" '(3) = "Defined" '(4) = "Managed" '(5) = "Measured" '

dim taggedValueName dim valueArray(5) dim ruleArray(5) dim colorArray(5)
taggedValueName = "Increments"
valueArray(0) = "None" valueArray(1) = "Initial" valueArray(2) = "UnderDevelopment" valueArray(3) = "Defined" valueArray(4) = "Managed" valueArray(5) = "Measured"
ruleArray(0) = "taggedValue.Value = """ & valueArray(0) & """" ruleArray(1) = "taggedValue.Value = """ & valueArray(1) & """" ruleArray(2) = "taggedValue.Value = """ & valueArray(2) & """" ruleArray(3) = "taggedValue.Value = """ & valueArray(3) & """" ruleArray(4) = "taggedValue.Value = """ & valueArray(4) & """" ruleArray(5) = "taggedValue.Value = """ & valueArray(5) & """"
colorArray(0) = colorLightGrey colorArray(1) = colorRed colorArray(2) = colorOrange colorArray(3) = colorGold colorArray(4) = colorPaleGreen colorArray(5) = colorGreen

CreateDiagramLegend "Maturity Level", valueArray, colorArray
end sub

!INC Local Scripts.EAConstants-VBScript !INC APG Diagram Script Utilities.Set Current Diagram Objects Style
const HIERARCHY_TAB = "SNNA Application Hierarchy Diagram"
sub OnProjectBrowserScript()
' Get the type of element selected in the Project Browser dim treeSelectedType treeSelectedType = Repository.GetTreeSelectedItemType()

case else ' Error message Session.Prompt "This script does not support items of this type.", promptOK
end select

sub CreateNestedHierarchyDiagram( topElement, connectorMetaType, relatedElementMetaType)
dim subElement as EA.Element dim packageObject as EA.DiagramObject dim packageBoundary as EA.Element dim heatMapDiagram as EA.Diagram dim packageIndex dim packageTop dim packageVertOffset dim packageHorizOffset dim packageVertSpace dim packageHorizSpace dim packageWidth dim packageHeight dim packageElementColumnCount dim packageColumnIndex dim maxDiagramHeight dim relatedElementList1 dim relatedElementList2 dim anElement as EA.Element dim elementBoundary as EA.Element dim elementObject as EA.DiagramObject dim elementIndex dim elementVertOffset dim elementHorizOffset dim elementVertSpace dim elementWidth dim elementHeight dim elementColumnIndex dim elementHorizSpace dim elementsPerColumn dim elementTaggedValue as EA.TaggedValue dim boundaryTaggedValue as EA.TaggedValue
Repository.CreateOutputTab HIERARCHY_TAB Repository.EnsureOutputVisible HIERARCHY_TAB
Repository.WriteOutput HIERARCHY_TAB, "Creating heat map diagram for Element '" & topElement.Name & "'...", 0
set heatMapDiagram = topElement.Diagrams.AddNew( "Heat Map", "Package")
heatMapDiagram.Update
SetDiagramStyle heatMapDiagram, "HideEStereo=1"
Repository.OpenDiagram(heatMapDiagram.DiagramID)
elementVertOffset = 20 elementHorizOffset = 10 elementVertSpace = 10 elementWidth = 100 elementHeight = 45 elementHorizSpace = 10
packageIndex = 0 packageColumnIndex = 0 packageHorizOffset = 10 packageHorizSpace = 10 packageVertOffset = 10 packageVertSpace = 10 packageElementColumnCount = 2 packageTop = -packageVertOffset maxDiagramHeight = 400
packageWidth = packageElementColumnCount * ( elementWidth + elementHorizSpace ) + elementHorizOffset
set relatedElementList1 = GetElementRelatedElements(topElement, connectorMetaType, relatedElementMetaType)
for each subElement in relatedElementList1.Items
if subElement.MetaType = relatedElementMetaType then
Repository.WriteOutput HIERARCHY_TAB, "Adding diagram object for Element '" & subElement.Name & "'...", 0
set packageBoundary = topElement.Elements.AddNew(subElement.Name, "Boundary")
packageBoundary.Update
set packageObject = heatMapDiagram.DiagramObjects.AddNew(subElement.Name,"")
set relatedElementList2 = GetElementRelatedElements(subElement, "UsedBy", "ApplicationComponent")
packageHeight = ( Int( ( relatedElementList2.Count - 1 ) / packageElementColumnCount ) + 1 ) * ( elementHeight + elementVertSpace ) + elementVertOffset
packageObject.DiagramID = heatMapDiagram.DiagramID packageObject.ElementID = packageBoundary.ElementID
packageObject.left = packageHorizOffset + packageColumnIndex * ( packageWidth + packageHorizSpace) packageObject.top = packageTop packageObject.right = packageObject.left + packageWidth packageObject.bottom = packageObject.top - packageHeight
if packageObject.bottom < -maxDiagramHeight then
packageColumnIndex = packageColumnIndex + 1 packageTop = -packageVertOffset
packageObject.left = packageHorizOffset + packageColumnIndex * ( packageWidth + packageHorizSpace) packageObject.top = packageTop packageObject.right = packageObject.left + packageWidth packageObject.bottom = packageObject.top - packageHeight
end if
packageObject.Update
packageTop = packageTop - (packageHeight + packageVertSpace)
packageIndex = packageIndex + 1
elementIndex = 0
for each anElement in relatedElementList2.Items
Repository.WriteOutput HIERARCHY_TAB, "- Adding diagram object for Element '" & anElement.Name & "'...", 0
elementsPerColumn = Int(( packageHeight - elementVertOffset ) / ( elementHeight + elementVertSpace))
set elementBoundary = subElement.Elements.AddNew(anElement.name,"Boundary")
elementBoundary.Status = anElement.Status 'elementBoundary.Stereotype = anElement.Stereotype elementBoundary.Properties.Item("BorderStyle").Value = "Solid"
for each elementTaggedValue in anElement.TaggedValues
set boundaryTaggedValue = elementBoundary.TaggedValues.AddNew(elementTaggedValue.Name,"")
boundaryTaggedValue.Value = elementTaggedValue.Value
boundaryTaggedValue.Update
next
elementBoundary.Update
set elementObject = heatMapDiagram.DiagramObjects.AddNew(anElement.Alias,"")
elementColumnIndex = Int(elementIndex / elementsPerColumn)
elementObject.DiagramID = heatMapDiagram.DiagramID elementObject.ElementID = elementBoundary.ElementID
elementObject.left = packageObject.left + elementHorizOffset + elementColumnIndex * (elementWidth + elementHorizSpace) elementObject.top = packageObject.top - ((elementIndex - Int( elementIndex / elementsPerColumn ) * elementsPerColumn) * (elementHeight + elementVertSpace)) - elementVertOffset elementObject.right = elementObject.left + elementWidth elementObject.bottom = elementObject.top - elementHeight
elementObject.Update
elementIndex = elementIndex + 1
next
heatMapDiagram.Update
Repository.ReloadDiagram(heatMapDiagram.DiagramID)
end if
next
Repository.WriteOutput HIERARCHY_TAB, "Finished!", 0
end sub

'Repository.WriteOutput HIERARCHY_TAB, "relatedElementID = " & relatedElementID, 0 'Repository.WriteOutput HIERARCHY_TAB, "relatedElement.Name = " & relatedElement.Name, 0 'Repository.WriteOutput HIERARCHY_TAB, "relatedElement.MetaType = " & relatedElement.MetaType, 0

end if next
set GetElementRelatedElements = relatedElementList

Column.name: Script
Column.value:
option explicit
!INC Local Scripts.EAConstants-VBScript !INC APG Diagram Script Utilities.Set Current Diagram Objects Style
const HIERARCHY_TAB = "APG Aggregate Capability Data"
sub OnProjectBrowserScript()
' Get the type of element selected in the Project Browser dim treeSelectedType treeSelectedType = Repository.GetTreeSelectedItemType()
' Handling Code: Uncomment any types you wish this script to support ' NOTE: You can toggle comments on multiple lines that are currently ' selected with [CTRL]+[SHIFT]+[C]. select case treeSelectedType
case otElement ' Code for when an element is selected dim theElement as EA.Element set theElement = Repository.GetTreeSelectedObject()
CreateNestedHierarchyDiagram theElement, "ValueStream"
'case otPackage ' ' Code for when a package is selected ' dim thePackage as EA.Package ' set thePackage = Repository.GetTreeSelectedObject() ' ' CreateNestedHierarchyDiagram thePackage ' ' case otDiagram ' ' Code for when a diagram is selected ' dim theDiagram as EA.Diagram ' set theDiagram = Repository.GetTreeSelectedObject() ' ' case otAttribute ' ' Code for when an attribute is selected ' dim theAttribute as EA.Attribute ' set theAttribute = Repository.GetTreeSelectedObject() ' ' case otMethod ' ' Code for when a method is selected ' dim theMethod as EA.Method ' set theMethod = Repository.GetTreeSelectedObject()
case else ' Error message Session.Prompt "This script does not support items of this type.", promptOK
end select
end sub
sub CreateNestedHierarchyDiagram( topElement, subElementMetaType)
dim subElement as EA.Element dim capAveHealthScore dim capAveRiskScore dim capTotalAnnualCost dim appHealthScore dim appRiskScore dim appTotalAnnualCost dim appCount dim relatedElementList1 dim relatedElementList2 dim anElement as EA.Element dim anApplComp as EA.Element dim elementTaggedValue as EA.TaggedValue
Repository.CreateOutputTab HIERARCHY_TAB Repository.EnsureOutputVisible HIERARCHY_TAB
Repository.WriteOutput HIERARCHY_TAB, "Aggregating capability application data for Element '" & topElement.Name & "'...", 0
for each subElement in topElement.Elements
if subElement.MetaType = subElementMetaType then
Repository.WriteOutput HIERARCHY_TAB, "- ValueStream '" & subElement.Name & "'...", 0
set relatedElementList1 = GetElementRelatedElements(subElement, "Aggregation", "Capability")
for each anElement in relatedElementList1.Items
Repository.WriteOutput HIERARCHY_TAB, " - Capability '" & anElement.Name & "'...", 0
capAveHealthScore = 0 capAveRiskScore = 0 capTotalAnnualCost = 0 appCount = 0
set relatedElementList2 = GetElementRelatedElements(anElement, "UsedBy", "ApplicationComponent")
for each anApplComp in relatedElementList2.Items
Repository.WriteOutput HIERARCHY_TAB, " - Application '" & anApplComp.Name & "'...", 0
appHealthScore = CDbl(anApplComp.TaggedValues.GetByName("Health Score").Value) appRiskScore = CDbl(anApplComp.TaggedValues.GetByName("Risk Score").Value) appTotalAnnualCost = CDbl(anApplComp.TaggedValues.GetByName("Total Annual Cost").Value)
capAveHealthScore = capAveHealthScore + appHealthScore capAveRiskScore = capAveRiskScore + appRiskScore capTotalAnnualCost = capTotalAnnualCost + appTotalAnnualCost
appCount = appCount + 1
next
capAveHealthScore = capAveHealthScore / appCount capAveRiskScore = capAveRiskScore / appCount
set elementTaggedValue = anElement.TaggedValues.GetByName("Ave Health Score") elementTaggedValue.Value = capAveHealthScore elementTaggedValue.Update
set elementTaggedValue = anElement.TaggedValues.GetByName("Ave Risk Score") elementTaggedValue.Value = capAveRiskScore elementTaggedValue.Update
set elementTaggedValue = anElement.TaggedValues.GetByName("Total Annual Cost") elementTaggedValue.Value = capTotalAnnualCost elementTaggedValue.Update
next
end if
next
Repository.WriteOutput HIERARCHY_TAB, "Finished!", 0
end sub
function GetElementRelatedElements( element, connectorMetaType, relatedElementMetaType)
dim connector as EA.Connector dim relatedElementList dim relatedElementID dim relatedElement as EA.Element
set relatedElementList = CreateObject("Scripting.Dictionary")
'Repository.WriteOutput HIERARCHY_TAB, element.Name & " element.Connectors.Count = " & element.Connectors.Count, 0
for each connector in element.Connectors
'Repository.WriteOutput HIERARCHY_TAB, "connector.Type = " & connector.Type, 0 'Repository.WriteOutput HIERARCHY_TAB, "connector.MetaType = " & connector.MetaType, 0
if connector.MetaType = connectorMetaType then
if connector.ClientID = element.ElementID then relatedElementID = connector.SupplierID else relatedElementID = connector.ClientID end if
set relatedElement = Repository.GetElementByID(relatedElementID)
'Repository.WriteOutput HIERARCHY_TAB, "relatedElementID = " & relatedElementID, 0 'Repository.WriteOutput HIERARCHY_TAB, "relatedElement.Name = " & relatedElement.Name, 0 'Repository.WriteOutput HIERARCHY_TAB, "relatedElement.MetaType = " & relatedElement.MetaType, 0
if relatedElement.MetaType = relatedElementMetaType then relatedElementList.Add relatedElement.ElementGUID, relatedElement end if
end if next
set GetElementRelatedElements = relatedElementList
end function

sub Test(elementGUID)
dim anElement as EA.Element
set anElement = Repository.GetElementByGuid(elementGUID)
CreateNestedHierarchyDiagram anElement

end sub
sub CreateNestedHierarchyDiagram( topElement, subElementMetaType)
dim subElement as EA.Element dim capAveHealthScore dim capAveRiskScore dim capTotalAnnualCost dim appHealthScore dim appRiskScore dim appTotalAnnualCost dim appCount dim relatedElementList1 dim relatedElementList2 dim anElement as EA.Element dim anApplComp as EA.Element dim elementTaggedValue as EA.TaggedValue
Repository.CreateOutputTab HIERARCHY_TAB Repository.EnsureOutputVisible HIERARCHY_TAB
Repository.WriteOutput HIERARCHY_TAB, "Resetting capability application data for Element '" & topElement.Name & "'...", 0
for each subElement in topElement.Elements
if subElement.MetaType = subElementMetaType then
Repository.WriteOutput HIERARCHY_TAB, "- ValueStream '" & subElement.Name & "'...", 0
set relatedElementList1 = GetElementRelatedElements(subElement, "Aggregation", "Capability")
for each anElement in relatedElementList1.Items
Repository.WriteOutput HIERARCHY_TAB, " - Capability '" & anElement.Name & "'...", 0
capAveHealthScore = 0 capAveRiskScore = 0 capTotalAnnualCost = 0
set elementTaggedValue = anElement.TaggedValues.GetByName("Ave Health Score") elementTaggedValue.Value = capAveHealthScore elementTaggedValue.Update
set elementTaggedValue = anElement.TaggedValues.GetByName("Ave Risk Score") elementTaggedValue.Value = capAveRiskScore elementTaggedValue.Update
set elementTaggedValue = anElement.TaggedValues.GetByName("Total Annual Cost") elementTaggedValue.Value = capTotalAnnualCost elementTaggedValue.Update
set elementTaggedValue = anElement.TaggedValues.GetByName("Category") elementTaggedValue.Value = "" elementTaggedValue.Update
set elementTaggedValue = anElement.TaggedValues.GetByName("Type") elementTaggedValue.Value = "" elementTaggedValue.Update
set elementTaggedValue = anElement.TaggedValues.GetByName("Investment Disposition") elementTaggedValue.Value = "" elementTaggedValue.Update
set elementTaggedValue = anElement.TaggedValues.GetByName("Current Maturity Level") elementTaggedValue.Value = "" elementTaggedValue.Update
set elementTaggedValue = anElement.TaggedValues.GetByName("Future Maturity Level") elementTaggedValue.Value = "" elementTaggedValue.Update
set elementTaggedValue = anElement.TaggedValues.GetByName("Current Performance Level") elementTaggedValue.Value = "" elementTaggedValue.Update
set elementTaggedValue = anElement.TaggedValues.GetByName("Future Performance Level") elementTaggedValue.Value = "" elementTaggedValue.Update
next
end if
next
Repository.WriteOutput HIERARCHY_TAB, "Finished!", 0
end sub
function GetElementRelatedElements( element, connectorMetaType, relatedElementMetaType)
dim connector as EA.Connector dim relatedElementList dim relatedElementID dim relatedElement as EA.Element
set relatedElementList = CreateObject("Scripting.Dictionary")
'Repository.WriteOutput HIERARCHY_TAB, element.Name & " element.Connectors.Count = " & element.Connectors.Count, 0
for each connector in element.Connectors
'Repository.WriteOutput HIERARCHY_TAB, "connector.Type = " & connector.Type, 0 'Repository.WriteOutput HIERARCHY_TAB, "connector.MetaType = " & connector.MetaType, 0
if connector.MetaType = connectorMetaType then
if connector.ClientID = element.ElementID then relatedElementID = connector.SupplierID else relatedElementID = connector.ClientID end if
set relatedElement = Repository.GetElementByID(relatedElementID)
'Repository.WriteOutput HIERARCHY_TAB, "relatedElementID = " & relatedElementID, 0 'Repository.WriteOutput HIERARCHY_TAB, "relatedElement.Name = " & relatedElement.Name, 0 'Repository.WriteOutput HIERARCHY_TAB, "relatedElement.MetaType = " & relatedElement.MetaType, 0
if relatedElement.MetaType = relatedElementMetaType then relatedElementList.Add relatedElement.ElementGUID, relatedElement end if
end if next
set GetElementRelatedElements = relatedElementList
end function

'Session.Prompt "outside " & element.Name & "complexity is" & element.Complexity & " value is " & rule, promptOK 'if element.Complexity = value then if eval( rule) then 'Session.Prompt "inside array " & element.Name & "color" & backgroundColor, promptOK 'Session.Prompt "inside array " & rule, promptOK backgroundColor = colorArray(index) updateStyle = "BCol=" & backgroundColor & ";BFol=" & textColor SetDiagramObjectStyle diagramObject, updateStyle diagramObject.Update
end if
next
next

else Session.Prompt "This script requires a diagram to be visible", promptOK end if

Column.name: Notes
Column.value: <Script Name="Create Nested Hierarchy Diagram" Type="Internal" Language="VBScript"/>

Column.name: Script
Column.value:
' Copyright (c) 2011-2018 Sparx Services North America. All rights reserved. www.sparxsystems.us
!INC Local Scripts.EAConstants-VBScript !INC Diagram Script Utilities.Set Diagram Styles !INC Diagram Script Utilities.Color Constants
const HIERARCHY_TAB = "SSNA Nested Hierarchy Diagram"
Const TOP_DOWN_FLOW_DIRECTION = 1 ' as Integer Const LEFT_RIGHT_FLOW_DIRECTION = 2 ' as Integer
class HierarchyDiagram
public elementMetaType ' as String public objectHeight ' as Integer public objectWidth ' as Integer public horizOffset ' as Integer public horizSpace ' as Integer public vertOffset ' as Integer public vertSpace ' as Integer public seqIndex ' as Integer public levelList ' as Scripting.Dictionary(Of HierarchyLevel) public childObjectList ' as Scripting.Dictionary(Of HierarchyObject) public package ' as EA.Package public diagram ' as EA.Diagram
private sub Class_Initialize
seqIndex = 9999 set levelList = nothing set childObjectList = nothing set package = nothing set diagram = nothing
end sub
public sub createDiagram( diagramName, diagramType)
set diagram = package.Diagrams.AddNew( diagramName, diagramType)
diagram.Update
setDiagramStyle diagram, "HideEStereo=1"
end sub
public sub loadRootObjectList
dim rootObject ' as HierarchyObject
set childObjectList = createPackageHierarchyObjectList( Me, package, elementMetatype)
for each rootObject in childObjectList.Items
set rootObject.diagram = Me
Repository.WriteOutput HIERARCHY_TAB, "--> Loading Root Element '" & rootObject.element.Name & "'...", 0
if levelList.Count > 1 then rootObject.LoadChildObjectList end if
next
end sub
public sub drawRootObjects
dim rootObject ' as HierarchyObject
drawObjectList Me, childObjectList, 1
for each rootObject in childObjectList.Items rootObject.drawChildObjects next
diagram.Update
end sub
public sub hideConnectors
dim link ' as EA.DiagramLink
for each link in diagram.DiagramLinks link.IsHidden = true link.Update next
diagram.DiagramLinks.Refresh
end sub
public sub addObject( anObject)
dim nextSeqIndex ' as Integer
set anObject.diagram = Me
set anObject.diagramObject = Me.diagram.DiagramObjects.AddNew("", "")
anObject.diagramObject.ElementID = anObject.element.ElementID
nextSeqIndex = Me.SeqIndex - 1
anObject.diagramObject.sequence = nextSeqIndex
Me.seqIndex = nextSeqIndex
end sub
end Class
class HierarchyLevel
public levelNumber ' as Integer public numObjects ' as Integer = numRows when flowDirection = TOP_DOWN; = numColumns when flowDirection = LEFT_RIGHT public flowDirection ' as Integer public objectStyle ' as ObjectStyle
private sub Class_Initialize
set objectStyle = new HierarchyObjectStyle
end sub
End Class
class HierarchyObjectStyle
public fillColor ' as RGB/Integer public lineWidth ' as Integer public lineColor ' as RGB/Integer public fontName ' as String public fontSize ' as Integer public fontColor ' as RGB/Integer public fontBold ' as Boolean public fontItalic ' as Boolean public fontUnderline ' as Boolean
End Class
class HierarchyObject
public levelNumber ' as Integer public row ' as Integer public column ' as Integer public parentObject ' as HierarchyObject public childObjectList ' as Scripting.Dictionary(Of HierarchyObject) public diagram ' as HierarchyDiagram public element ' as EA.Element public diagramObject ' as EA.DiagramObject
private sub Class_Initialize
set parentObject = nothing set childObjectList = nothing set diagram = nothing set diagramObject = nothing
end sub
public sub loadChildObjectList
dim eaElement ' as EA.Element dim childObject ' as HierarchyObject
set childObjectList = CreateObject("Scripting.Dictionary")
for each eaElement in element.Elements
if eaElement.MetaType = diagram.elementMetaType then
set childObject = New HierarchyObject
set childObject.element = eaElement set childObject.parentObject = Me set childObject.diagram = diagram childObject.levelNumber = levelNumber + 1
childObjectList.Add childObject.element.ElementGUID, childObject
Repository.WriteOutput HIERARCHY_TAB, String(childObject.levelNumber * 2, "-") & "> Loading Child Element '" & childObject.element.Name & "'...", 0
if childObject.levelNumber = diagram.levelList.Count then set childObject.childObjectList = Nothing else childObject.loadChildObjectList end if
end if
next
end sub
public sub drawChildObjects
dim childObject ' as HierarchyObject
if not childObjectList is Nothing then
drawObjectList diagram, childObjectList, levelNumber + 1
for each childObject in childObjectList.Items childObject.drawChildObjects next
end if
end sub
public sub resize( childObject)
dim objectCurrRight ' as Integer dim objectCurrBottom ' as Integer dim objectNewRight ' as Integer dim objectNewBottom ' as Integer
objectCurrRight = diagramObject.right objectCurrBottom = diagramObject.bottom
objectNewRight = childObject.diagramObject.right + diagram.horizSpace objectNewBottom = childObject.diagramObject.bottom - diagram.vertSpace
if objectCurrRight <> objectNewRight or objectCurrBottom <> objectNewBottom then
if objectNewRight > objectCurrRight then diagramObject.right = objectNewRight end if
if objectNewBottom < objectCurrBottom then diagramObject.bottom = objectNewBottom end if
Repository.WriteOutput HIERARCHY_TAB, "*** RESIZED object '" & element.name & "' to (" & diagramObject.left & "," & diagramObject.top & ") x ( " & diagramObject.right & "," & diagramObject.bottom & ")", 0
diagramObject.Update Repository.ReloadDiagram(diagram.diagram.DiagramID)
moveNeighborObjects
if Not parentObject is nothing then
if TypeName(parentObject) = "HierarchyObject" Then parentObject.resize Me end if
end if
end if
end sub
public sub moveNeighborObjects
dim rightObject ' as HierarchyObject dim rightObjectWidth ' as Integer dim rightObjectCurrLeft ' as Integer dim rightObjectNewLeft ' as Integer dim rightObjectMoved ' as Integer dim bottomObject ' as HierarchyObject dim bottomObjectHeight ' as Integer dim bottomObjectCurrTop ' as Integer dim bottomObjectNewTop ' as Integer dim bottomObjectMoved ' as Integer
set rightObject = getRightObject set bottomObject = getBottomObject
rightObjectMoved = false bottomObjectMoved = false
if rightObject is nothing then
if TypeName(parentObject) = "HierarchyObject" then parentObject.resize Me end if
else
rightObjectWidth = rightObject.width
rightObjectCurrLeft = rightObject.diagramObject.left
rightObjectNewLeft = diagramObject.right + diagram.horizSpace
if rightObjectNewLeft <> rightObjectCurrLeft then
rightObject.diagramObject.left = rightObjectNewLeft rightObject.diagramObject.right = rightObjectNewLeft + rightObjectWidth
Repository.WriteOutput HIERARCHY_TAB, "*** Moved RIGHT object '" & rightObject.element.name & "' to (" & rightObject.diagramObject.left & "," & rightObject.diagramObject.top & ") x ( " & rightObject.diagramObject.right & "," & rightObject.diagramObject.bottom & ")", 0
rightObject.diagramObject.Update Repository.ReloadDiagram(diagram.diagram.DiagramID)
rightObjectMoved = true
end if
end if
if bottomObject is nothing then
if TypeName(parentObject) = "HierarchyObject" then parentObject.resize Me end if
else
bottomObjectHeight = bottomObject.Height
bottomObjectCurrTop = bottomObject.diagramObject.top
bottomObjectNewTop = diagramObject.bottom - diagram.vertSpace
if bottomObjectNewTop <> bottomObjectCurrTop then
bottomObject.diagramObject.top = bottomObjectNewTop bottomObject.diagramObject.bottom = bottomObjectNewTop - bottomObjectHeight
Repository.WriteOutput HIERARCHY_TAB, "*** Moved BOTTOM object '" & bottomObject.element.name & "' to (" & bottomObject.diagramObject.left & "," & bottomObject.diagramObject.top & ") x ( " & bottomObject.diagramObject.right & "," & bottomObject.diagramObject.bottom & ")", 0
bottomObject.diagramObject.Update Repository.ReloadDiagram(diagram.diagram.DiagramID)
bottomObjectMoved = true
end if
end if
if rightObjectMoved then rightObject.moveNeighborObjects end if
if bottomObjectMoved then bottomObject.moveNeighborObjects end if
end sub
public property get height height = diagramObject.top - diagramObject.bottom end property
public property get width width = diagramObject.right - diagramObject.left end property
public function getRightObject set getRightObject = getGridObject(column + 1, row) end function
public function getBottomObject set getBottomObject = getGridObject(column, row + 1) end function
public function getGridObject( getColumn, getRow)
dim peerObject ' as HierarchyObject dim foundObject ' as HierarchyObject
set foundObject = nothing
for each peerObject in parentObject.childObjectList.Items
if peerObject.column = getColumn and peerObject.row = getRow then set foundObject = peerObject exit for end if
next
set getGridObject = foundObject
end function
public property let fillColor( value) if value <> vbNullString then SetDiagramObjectStyle Me.diagramObject, "BCol=" & value end if end property
public property let lineWidth( value) SetDiagramObjectStyle Me.diagramObject, "LWth=" & value end property
public property let lineColor( value) SetDiagramObjectStyle Me.diagramObject, "LCol=" & value end property
public property let fontName( value) SetDiagramObjectStyle Me.diagramObject, "font=" & value end property
public property let fontSize( value) SetDiagramObjectStyle Me.diagramObject, "fontsz=" & value * 10 end property
public property let fontColor( value) SetDiagramObjectStyle Me.diagramObject, "BFol=" & value end property
public property let fontBold( value) SetDiagramObjectStyle Me.diagramObject, "bold=" & value end property
public property let fontItalic( value) SetDiagramObjectStyle Me.diagramObject, "italic=" & value end property
public property let fontUnderline( value) SetDiagramObjectStyle Me.diagramObject, "ul=" & value end property
End Class
public sub drawObjectList( diagram, objectList, levelNumber)
dim level ' as HierarchyLevel dim objectIndex ' as Integer dim coord1 ' as Integer dim coord2 ' as Integer dim object ' as HierarchyObject dim parentObjectLeft ' as Integer dim parentObjectTop ' as Integer
set level = diagram.levelList.Item(levelNumber)
objectIndex = 1
for each object in objectList.Items
diagram.addObject object
coord1 = Int( ( objectIndex - 1 ) / level.numObjects ) + 1 coord2 = objectIndex - ( coord1 - 1 ) * level.numObjects
if level.flowDirection = LEFT_RIGHT_FLOW_DIRECTION then object.row = coord1 object.column = coord2 else object.row = coord2 object.column = coord1 end if
Repository.WriteOutput HIERARCHY_TAB, String(object.levelNumber * 2, "-") & "> Adding diagram object for Element '" & object.element.Name & "' #" & objectIndex & " ( " & object.column & ", " & object.row & " )", 0
if object.parentObject is nothing then parentObjectLeft = 0 parentObjectTop = 0 else
if TypeName(object.ParentObject) = "HierarchyObject" then parentObjectLeft = object.parentObject.diagramObject.left parentObjectTop = object.parentObject.diagramObject.top else parentObjectLeft = 0 parentObjectTop = 0 end if
end if
object.diagramObject.left = parentObjectLeft + ( object.column - 1 ) * ( diagram.objectWidth + diagram.horizSpace ) + diagram.horizOffset object.diagramObject.top = parentObjectTop - ( ( object.row - 1 ) * ( diagram.objectHeight + diagram.vertSpace ) + diagram.vertOffset ) object.diagramObject.right = object.diagramObject.left + diagram.objectWidth object.diagramObject.bottom = object.diagramObject.top - diagram.objectHeight
object.fillColor = level.objectStyle.fillColor object.lineWidth = level.objectStyle.lineWidth object.lineColor = level.objectStyle.lineColor object.fontName = level.objectStyle.fontName object.fontSize = level.objectStyle.fontSize object.fontColor = level.objectStyle.fontColor object.fontBold = level.objectStyle.fontBold object.fontItalic = level.objectStyle.fontItalic object.fontUnderline = level.objectStyle.fontUnderline
Repository.WriteOutput HIERARCHY_TAB, String(object.levelNumber * 2, "-") & "> LeftTop: ( " & object.diagramObject.left & ", " & object.diagramObject.top & " ) RightBottom: ( " & object.diagramObject.right & ", " & object.diagramObject.bottom & " )", 0
object.diagramObject.Update
Repository.ReloadDiagram(object.diagram.diagram.DiagramID)
if Not object.parentObject is Nothing then
if TypeName(object.parentObject) = "HierarchyObject" then object.parentObject.resize object end if
end if
objectIndex = objectIndex + 1
next
end sub
sub createNestedHierarchyDiagram( package, elementMetaType, levelList)
dim diagram ' as HierarchyDiagram
Repository.CreateOutputTab HIERARCHY_TAB Repository.EnsureOutputVisible HIERARCHY_TAB
Repository.WriteOutput HIERARCHY_TAB, "Creating nested hierarchy diagram for Element '" & package.Name & "'...", 0
set diagram = New HierarchyDiagram
diagram.elementMetaType = elementMetatype diagram.horizOffset = 10 diagram.horizSpace = 10 diagram.vertOffset = 50 diagram.vertSpace = 10 diagram.objectHeight = 50 diagram.objectWidth = 150 set diagram.package = package
diagram.createDiagram elementMetaType & " Nested Hierarchy", "Package"
Repository.OpenDiagram(diagram.diagram.DiagramID)
set diagram.levelList = levelList
Repository.WriteOutput HIERARCHY_TAB, "diagram.levelList.Count = " & diagram.levelList.count, 0
diagram.loadRootObjectList
diagram.drawRootObjects
diagram.hideConnectors
Repository.SaveDiagram(diagram.diagram.diagramID)
Repository.ReloadDiagram(diagram.diagram.DiagramID)
Repository.WriteOutput HIERARCHY_TAB, "Finished!", 0
end sub
function createPackageHierarchyObjectList( diagram, package, elementMetaType)
dim objectList dim eaElement as EA.Element dim object
set objectList = CreateObject("Scripting.Dictionary")
for each eaElement in package.Elements
if eaElement.MetaType = elementMetaType then
set object = New HierarchyObject
set object.Element = eaElement set object.ParentObject = diagram object.levelNumber = 1
objectList.Add object.element.ElementGUID, object
end if
next
set createPackageHierarchyObjectList = objectList
end function
sub Test( packageGUID)
dim packageID ' as String dim package as EA.Package dim levelList ' as Dictionary(Of HierarcyLevel) dim level1 ' as HierarchyLevel dim level2 ' as HierarchyLevel dim level3 ' as HierarchyLevel
set levelList = CreateObject("Scripting.Dictionary")
set level1 = New HierarchyLevel
level1.numObjects = 4 level1.flowDirection = TOP_DOWN_FLOW_DIRECTION
'level1.objectStyle.fillColor = colorPaleGreen 'level1.objectStyle.lineWidth = 2 'level1.objectStyle.lineColor = colorRed 'level1.objectStyle.fontName = "Century" 'level1.objectStyle.fontSize = 14 'level1.objectStyle.fontColor = colorGold
levelList.Add 1, level1
'set level2 = New HierarchyLevel
'level2.numObjects = 3 'level2.flowDirection = LEFT_RIGHT_FLOW_DIRECTION
'level2.objectStyle.fillColor = colorDarkOrange 'level2.objectStyle.lineWidth = 3 'level2.objectStyle.lineColor = colorMediumOrchid 'level2.objectStyle.fontName = "Jokerman" 'level2.objectStyle.fontSize = 12 'level2.objectStyle.fontColor = colorRed
'levelList.Add 2, level2
' set level3 = New HierarchyLevel ' ' level3.numObjects = 3 ' level3.flowDirection = TOP_DOWN_FLOW_DIRECTION ' ' levelList.Add 3, level3
set package = Repository.GetPackageByGuid( packageGUID)
createNestedHierarchyDiagram package, "Capability", levelList
end sub

Column.name: Notes
Column.value: <Script Name="Set Diagram Styles" Type="Internal" Language="VBScript"/>

Column.name: Script
Column.value:
' Scripts to update styles diagram objects. ' ' Copyright (c) 2011-2018 Sparx Services North America. All rights reserved. www.sparxsystems.us
const STYLE_DELIMITER = ";" const STYLE_ASSIGNMENT = "="
sub SetCurrentDiagramObjectsStyle(elementMetaType, updateStyleList)
dim theDiagram as EA.Diagram
set theDiagram = Repository.GetCurrentDiagram
theDiagram.Update
SetDiagramObjectsStyle theDiagram, elementMetaType, updateStyleList
theDiagram.Update
end sub
sub SetDiagramObjectsStyle( theDiagram, elementMetaType, updateStyleList)
dim diagramObject as EA.DiagramObject dim diagramElement as EA.Element dim elementID dim updateStyleArray dim updateStyle
updateStyleArray = Split(updateStyleList, STYLE_DELIMITER)
for each diagramObject in theDiagram.DiagramObjects
elementID = diagramObject.ElementID
set diagramElement = Repository.GetElementByID(elementID)
if diagramElement.metaType = elementMetaType then
for each updateStyle in updateStyleArray SetDiagramObjectStyle diagramObject, updateStyle next
diagramObject.Update
end if
next
Repository.ReloadDiagram theDiagram.DiagramID
end sub
sub SetDiagramObjectStyle( diagramObject, updateStyle)
dim updateStylePartArray dim updateStyleName dim lineStyleList dim lineStyleArray dim lineStyleIndex dim lineStyle dim styleFound
updateStylePartArray = Split(updateStyle, STYLE_ASSIGNMENT)
updateStyleName = updateStylePartArray(0)
lineStyleList = diagramObject.Style
lineStyleArray = Split(lineStyleList, STYLE_DELIMITER)
lineStyleIndex = 0 styleFound = false
for each lineStyle in lineStyleArray
if InStr( lineStyle, updateStyleName & STYLE_ASSIGNMENT) then
lineStyle = updateStyle
lineStyleArray(lineStyleIndex) = lineStyle
styleFound = true
end if
lineStyleIndex = lineStyleIndex + 1
next
lineStyleList = Join(lineStyleArray, STYLE_DELIMITER)
if not( styleFound) then lineStyleList = lineStyleList & updateStyle & STYLE_DELIMITER end if
diagramObject.Style = lineStyleList
end sub
sub SetDiagramStyle( diagram, updateStyle)
dim updateStylePartArray dim updateStyleName dim lineStyleList dim lineStyleArray dim lineStyleIndex dim lineStyle dim styleFound
updateStylePartArray = Split(updateStyle, STYLE_ASSIGNMENT)
updateStyleName = updateStylePartArray(0)
lineStyleList = diagram.ExtendedStyle
lineStyleArray = Split(lineStyleList, STYLE_DELIMITER)
lineStyleIndex = 0 styleFound = false
for each lineStyle in lineStyleArray
if InStr( lineStyle, updateStyleName & STYLE_ASSIGNMENT) then
lineStyle = updateStyle
lineStyleArray(lineStyleIndex) = lineStyle
styleFound = true
end if
lineStyleIndex = lineStyleIndex + 1
next
lineStyleList = Join(lineStyleArray, STYLE_DELIMITER)
if not( styleFound) then lineStyleList = lineStyleList & updateStyle & STYLE_DELIMITER end if
diagram.ExtendedStyle = lineStyleList
end sub

sub OnProjectBrowserScript()

select case treeSelectedType
case otPackage
set thePackage = Repository.GetTreeSelectedObject()

CreateNestedHierarchyDiagram thePackage, "Capability", levelList

function getDiagramLevelList
dim levelList ' as Scripting.Dictionary(Of HierarchyLevel) dim level1 ' as HierarchyLevel dim level2 ' as HierarchyLevel dim level3 ' as HierarchyLevel dim level4 ' as HierarchyLevel
set levelList = CreateObject("Scripting.Dictionary")
' *** FIRST LEVEL ***
set level1 = New HierarchyLevel
level1.numObjects = 4 level1.flowDirection = LEFT_RIGHT_FLOW_DIRECTION
'level1.objectStyle.fillColor = colorDeepSkyBlue 'level1.objectStyle.lineWidth = 2 'level1.objectStyle.lineColor = colorBlack 'level1.objectStyle.fontName = "Arial" 'level1.objectStyle.fontSize = 14 'level1.objectStyle.fontColor = colorGold
levelList.Add 1, level1
' *** SECOND LEVEL ***
set level2 = New HierarchyLevel
level2.numObjects = 2 level2.flowDirection = LEFT_RIGHT_FLOW_DIRECTION
'level2.objectStyle.fillColor = colorDeepSkyBlue 'level2.objectStyle.lineWidth = 1 'level2.objectStyle.lineColor = colorBlack 'level2.objectStyle.fontName = "Arial" 'level2.objectStyle.fontSize = 10 'level2.objectStyle.fontColor = colorBlack
levelList.Add 2, level2
' *** THIRD LEVEL ***
set level3 = New HierarchyLevel
level3.numObjects = 3 level3.flowDirection = TOP_DOWN_FLOW_DIRECTION
'level3.objectStyle.fillColor = colorLightCoral 'level3.objectStyle.lineWidth = 1 'level3.objectStyle.lineColor = colorBlack 'level3.objectStyle.fontName = "Arial" 'level3.objectStyle.fontSize = 10 'level3.objectStyle.fontColor = colorBlack
levelList.Add 3, level3
' *** FOURTH LEVEL ***
set level4 = New HierarchyLevel
level4.numObjects = 2 level4.flowDirection = LEFT_RIGHT_FLOW_DIRECTION
'level4.objectStyle.fillColor = colorLightSkyBlue 'level4.objectStyle.lineWidth = 1 'level4.objectStyle.lineColor = colorBlack 'level4.objectStyle.fontName = "Arial" 'level4.objectStyle.fontSize = 10 'level4.objectStyle.fontColor = colorBlack
levelList.Add 4, level4
set getDiagramLevelList = levelList
end function

option explicit
' Copyright (c) 2018 Sparx Systems North America. All rights reserved. info@sparxsystems.us
!INC Local Scripts.EAConstants-VBScript !INC BIZBOK Report Scripts.Report Script Library
dim xmlDoc 'as Microsoft.XMLDOM.XMLDocument dim xmlData 'as Microsoft.XMLDOM.XMLNode
function getValueStreamStageList( valueStreamID)
dim valueStream as EA.Element dim elementList 'as System.Collections.Sortedlist dim streamStage as EA.Element dim elementIndex 'as Integer dim elementKey 'as Double
set valueStream = Repository.GetElementByID( valueStreamID)
createXMLDocument
set elementList = CreateObject( "System.Collections.Sortedlist" )
for each streamStage in valueStream.Elements
if streamStage.Stereotype = "Value Stream Stage" then
elementKey = streamStage.TreePos
if elementKey = 0 then elementKey = streamStage.Name end if
elementList.Add elementKey, streamStage
end if
next
for elementIndex = 0 to elementList.Count - 1
set streamStage = elementList.GetByIndex( elementIndex)
addDetailRow streamStage
next
getValueStreamStageList = xmlDoc.XML
end function
sub addDetailRow( element)
dim xmlRow 'as Microsoft.XMLDOM.XMLNode
set xmlRow = xmlDoc.createElement( "Row") xmlData.appendChild xmlRow
addColumn xmlRow, "Name", element.Name, false addColumn xmlRow, "Notes", element.Notes, true addColumn xmlRow, "EntranceCriteria", getTaggedValueValue( element, "Entrance Criteria"), false addColumn xmlRow, "ExitCriteria", getTaggedValueValue( element, "Exit Criteria"), false addColumn xmlRow, "ValueItemList", getValueItemList( element), false
end sub
function getValueItemList( element)
dim elementList 'as Scripting.Dictionary dim relatedElement as EA.Element dim nameList 'as String
set elementList = getRelatedElementList( element, "Association", "offers", "Class", "Value Item")
nameList = vbNullString
for each relatedElement in elementList.Items
if nameList <> vbNullString then nameList = nameList & vbCRLF end if
nameList = nameList & relatedElement.Name
next
getValueItemList = nameList
end function
sub test
Session.Output getValueStreamStageList( 404)
end sub
'test

' Copyright (c) 2018 Sparx Systems North America. All rights reserved. info@sparxsystems.us
function getTaggedValueValue( element, taggedValueName)
dim taggedValue as EA.TaggedValue dim taggedValueValue 'as String
set taggedValue = element.TaggedValues.GetByName( taggedValueName)
if taggedValue is nothing then taggedValueValue = "" else taggedValueValue = taggedValue.Value end if
getTaggedValueValue = taggedValueValue
end function
function getRelatedElement( element, connectorMetaType, connectorStereotype, relatedElementMetaType, relatedElementStereotype)
dim relatedElementList ' as Scripting.Dictionary dim relatedElementArray ' as Element()
set relatedElementList = getRelatedElementList( element, connectorMetaType, connectorStereotype, relatedElementMetaType, relatedElementStereotype)
if relatedElementList.Count > 0 then relatedElementArray = relatedElementList.Items set getRelatedElement = relatedElementArray(0) else set getRelatedElement = nothing end if
end function
function getRelatedElementList( element, connectorType, connectorStereotype, relatedElementType, relatedElementStereotype, packageID)
dim connector as EA.Connector dim relatedElementList dim relatedElementID dim relatedElement as EA.Element
set relatedElementList = CreateObject( "Scripting.Dictionary")
for each connector in element.Connectors
if connector.Type = connectorType then
if IsNull(connectorStereotype) or connector.Stereotype = connectorStereotype then
if connector.ClientID = element.ElementID then relatedElementID = connector.SupplierID else relatedElementID = connector.ClientID end if
set relatedElement = Repository.GetElementByID(relatedElementID)
if relatedElement.Type = relatedElementType then
if IsNull( relatedElementStereotype) or relatedElement.Stereotype = relatedElementStereotype then
if packageID = 0 or relatedElement.PackageID = packageID then
if not relatedElementList.Exists( relatedElement.ElementGUID) then relatedElementList.Add relatedElement.ElementGUID, relatedElement end if
end if
end if
end if
end if
end if next
set getRelatedElementList = relatedElementList
end function
function getSortedRelatedElementList( element, connectorType, connectorStereotype, relatedElementType, relatedElementStereotype, packageID)
dim connector as EA.Connector dim relatedElementList dim relatedElementID dim relatedElement as EA.Element
set relatedElementList = CreateObject( "System.Collections.SortedList")
for each connector in element.Connectors
if connector.Type = connectorType then
if IsNull(connectorStereotype) or connector.Stereotype = connectorStereotype then
if connector.ClientID = element.ElementID then relatedElementID = connector.SupplierID else relatedElementID = connector.ClientID end if
set relatedElement = Repository.GetElementByID(relatedElementID)
if relatedElement.Type = relatedElementType then
if IsNull( relatedElementStereotype) or relatedElement.Stereotype = relatedElementStereotype then
if packageID = 0 or relatedElement.PackageID = packageID then
if not relatedElementList.ContainsKey( relatedElement.Name) then relatedElementList.Add relatedElement.Name, relatedElement end if
end if
end if
end if
end if
end if next
set getSortedRelatedElementList = relatedElementList
end function
sub addColumn( xmlRow, name, text, formatted)
dim xmlColumn 'as Microsoft.XMLDOM.XMLNode dim xmlAttr 'as Microsoft.XMLDOM.XMLAttribute
set xmlColumn = xmlDoc.createElement( name) xmlColumn.Text = text
if formatted then
set xmlAttr = xmlDoc.CreateAttribute( "formatted") xmlAttr.Value = "1"
xmlColumn.Attributes.SetNamedItem xmlAttr
end if
xmlRow.appendChild xmlColumn
end sub
function createXMLDocument()
dim xmlProc 'as Microsoft.XMLDOM.XMLNode dim xmlRoot 'as Microsoft.XMLDOM.XMLNode dim xmlDataset 'as Microsoft.XMLDOM.XMLNode
set xmlDoc = CreateObject( "Microsoft.XMLDOM")
xmlDoc.validateOnParse = false xmlDoc.async = false
set xmlProc = xmlDoc.createProcessingInstruction("xml", "version='1.0' encoding='ISO-8859-1'") xmlDoc.appendChild xmlProc
set xmlRoot = xmlDoc.createElement( "EADATA") xmlDoc.appendChild xmlRoot
set xmlDataset = xmlDoc.createElement( "Dataset_0") xmlRoot.appendChild xmlDataset
set xmlData = xmlDoc.createElement( "Data") xmlDataSet.appendChild xmlData
set createXMLDocument = xmlDoc
end function
function getOwnedElementNameList( element, ownedMetatypeList)
dim ownedElement as EA.Element dim nameList 'as String dim typeID 'as Integer dim typeElement as EA.Element dim elementName 'as String dim objectState 'as String
nameList = vbNullString
if ownedMetatypeList <> vbNullString then ownedMetatypeList = ownedMetatypeList & "," end if
for each ownedElement in element.EmbeddedElements
if InStr( ownedMetatypeList, ownedElement.MetaType & ",") then
typeID = ownedElement.PropertyType
if typeID = 0 then typeID = ownedElement.ClassfierID end if
if typeID = 0 then elementName = ownedElement.Name else
set typeElement = Repository.GetElementByID( typeID)
elementName = typeElement.Name
end if
if nameList <> vbNullString then nameList = nameList & vbCRLF end if
nameList = nameList & elementName
objectState = getCustomPropertyValue( ownedElement, "objectState")
if objectState <> vbNullString then nameList = nameList & " [" & objectState & "]" end if
end if
next
getOwnedElementNameList = nameList
end function
function getCustomPropertyValue( ownedElement, propertyName)
dim customProperty as EA._CustomProperty dim propertyValue 'as String
propertyValue = vbNullString
for each customProperty in ownedElement.CustomProperties
if customProperty.Name = propertyName then propertyValue = customProperty.Value exit for end if
next
getCustomPropertyValue = propertyValue
end function
function getAncestorPackage( element, ancestorPackageLevel)
dim packageLevel 'as Integer dim packageID 'as Integer dim package as EA.Package
packageID = element.PackageID
set package = Repository.GetPackageByID( packageID)
for packageLevel = 2 to ancestorPackageLevel
packageID = package.ParentID
if packageID = 0 then exit for end if
set package = Repository.GetPackageByID( packageID)
next
set getAncestorPackage = package
end function
function getChildElementList( parentElement, childStereotype)
dim childElement as EA.Element dim childElementList 'as Scripting.Dictionary
set childElementList = CreateObject("Scripting.Dictionary")
for each childElement in parentElement.Elements
if childElement.Stereotype = childStereotype then childElementList.Add childElement.ElementGUID, childElement end if
next
set getChildElementList = childElementList
end function
function getChildDiagram( parentElement, childDiagramName)
dim childDiagram as EA.Diagram dim foundDiagram as EA.Diagram
set foundDiagram = nothing
for each childDiagram in parentElement.Diagrams
if childDiagram.Name = childDiagramName then set foundDiagram = childDiagram exit for end if
next
set getChildDiagram = foundDiagram
end function
function createChildInstance( parentElement, childClassifier, childStereotype)
dim childElement as EA.Element dim foundInstance as EA.Element
set foundInstance = nothing
for each childElement in parentElement.Elements
if childElement.ClassifierID = childClassifier.ElementID then set foundInstance = childElement exit for end if
next
if foundInstance is nothing then
set foundInstance = parentElement.Elements.AddNew( "", "Object")
foundInstance.Stereotype = childStereotype foundInstance.ClassifierID = childClassifier.ElementID
foundInstance.Update
parentElement.Elements.Refresh
end if
set createChildInstance = foundInstance
end function
