Column.value: <Script Name="Create Value Stream Stage Capability Cross-Map Diagram" Type="Internal" Language="VBScript"/>

Column.name: Script
Column.value:
option explicit
' Script to automatically build a Value Stream Stage to Capability cross-map diagram.
!INC Local Scripts.EAConstants-VBScript !INC BIZBOK Report Scripts.Report Script Library
const HORIZ_PADDING = 40 const VERT_PADDING = 20 const DIAGRAM_LEFT_OFFSET = 40 const DIAGRAM_VERT_OFFSET = 10 const ELEMENT_WIDTH = 100 const ELEMENT_HEIGHT = 50
const vbYesNo = 4 const vbYes = 6
sub OnProjectBrowserScript()
dim treeSelectedType
treeSelectedType = Repository.GetTreeSelectedItemType()
if treeSelectedType = otElement then
dim valueStream as EA.Element
set valueStream = Repository.GetTreeSelectedObject()
if valueStream.Stereotype = "Value Stream" then createCapabilityCrossMap valueStream else Session.Prompt "Must select a Value Stream element for this script.", promptOK end if
else Session.Prompt "Must select a Value Stream element for this script.", promptOK end if
end sub
sub createCapabilityCrossMap( valueStream)
dim diagramName 'as String dim diagram as EA.Diagram dim overwriteDiagram 'as Boolean
diagramName = valueStream.Name & " - Capability Cross-Map"
diagramName = InputBox( "Enter diagram name:", "Create Capability Cross-Map", diagramName)
if diagramName <> "" then
set diagram = getChildDiagram( valueStream, diagramName)
if diagram is nothing then
Session.Output "Creating capability cross-map diagram..."
set diagram = valueStream.Diagrams.AddNew( diagramName, "Object")
diagram.StyleEx = diagram.StyleEx & "MDGDgm=BIZBOK Value Mapping Diagrams::Value Cross Mapping;"
diagram.Update
updateCapabilityCrossMapDiagram diagram, valueStream, diagramName
else
overwriteDiagram = MsgBox( "Diagram already exists. Overwrite?", vbYesNo)
if overwriteDiagram = vbYes then
deleteDiagramObjects diagram
updateCapabilityCrossMapDiagram diagram, valueStream, diagramName
end if
end if
end if
end sub
sub deleteDiagramObjects( diagram)
dim diagramObject as EA.DiagramObject dim objectCount 'as Integer dim objectIndex 'as Integer
objectCount = diagram.DiagramObjects.Count
for objectIndex = objectCount - 1 to 0 step -1 diagram.DiagramObjects.Delete( objectIndex) next
diagram.Update
end sub
sub updateCapabilityCrossMapDiagram( diagram, valueStream, diagramName)
Repository.OpenDiagram(diagram.DiagramID)
addValueStreamStages valueStream, diagram
valueStream.Diagrams.Refresh
Repository.RefreshModelView( valueStream.PackageID)
Repository.SaveDiagram(diagram.diagramID)
Repository.ReloadDiagram(diagram.DiagramID)
Session.Output "Finished!"
end sub
sub addValueStreamStages( valueStream, diagram)
dim stageList 'as List dim stage as EA.Element dim diagramObject as EA.DiagramObject dim leftPos 'as Integer dim left 'as Integer dim right 'as Integer dim top 'as Integer dim bottom 'as Integer
set stageList = getChildElementList( valueStream, "Value Stream Stage")
leftPos = DIAGRAM_LEFT_OFFSET
for each stage in stageList.Items
Session.Output "Adding " & stage.Name
left = leftPos right = leftPos + ELEMENT_WIDTH top = DIAGRAM_VERT_OFFSET bottom = DIAGRAM_VERT_OFFSET + ELEMENT_HEIGHT
set diagramObject = diagram.DiagramObjects.AddNew( "l=" & left & ";r=" & right & ";t=" & top & ";b=" & bottom, "")
diagramObject.ElementID = stage.ElementID
diagramObject.Update
Repository.ReloadDiagram(diagram.DiagramID)
addCapabilityInstances diagram, stage, leftPos, bottom
leftPos = right + HORIZ_PADDING
next
end sub
sub addCapabilityInstances( diagram, stage, parentLeft, parentBottom)
dim capabilityList 'as System.Collections.Sortedlist dim capability as EA.Element dim capabilityInstance as EA.Element dim diagramObject as EA.DiagramObject dim bottomPos 'as Integer dim index 'as Integer dim left 'as Integer dim right 'as Integer dim top 'as Integer dim bottom 'as Integer
set capabilityList = getSortedRelatedElementList( stage, "Association", "enables", "Class", "Capability")
bottomPos = parentBottom
for index = 0 to capabilityList.Count - 1
set capability = capabilityList.GetByIndex( index)
set capabilityInstance = createChildInstance( stage, capability, "Capability Instance")
left = parentLeft right = parentLeft + ELEMENT_WIDTH top = bottomPos + DIAGRAM_VERT_OFFSET bottom = bottomPos + DIAGRAM_VERT_OFFSET + ELEMENT_HEIGHT
Session.Output "- Adding " & capability.Name ' Session.Output "l=" & left & ";r=" & right & ";t=" & top & ";b=" & bottom
set diagramObject = diagram.DiagramObjects.AddNew( "l=" & left & ";r=" & right & ";t=" & top & ";b=" & bottom, "")
diagramObject.ElementID = capabilityInstance.ElementID
diagramObject.Update
Repository.ReloadDiagram(diagram.DiagramID)
bottomPos = bottom
' Session.Output "bottomPos=" & bottomPos
next
end sub
sub runTest
dim valueStream as EA.Element
set valueStream = Repository.GetElementByGuid( "{7B1A45DF-84A8-4952-A140-EBFD1A885C19}")
createCapabilityCrossMap valueStream
end sub
'runTest
OnProjectBrowserScript

Column.name: Notes
Column.value: <Group Type="NORMAL" Notes=""/>

Column.name: Script
Column.value: BIZBOK Diagram Utility Scripts

Column.name: Notes
Column.value: <Script Name="Create Nested Hierarchy Diagram" Type="Internal" Language="VBScript"/>

Column.name: Script
Column.value:
' Copyright (c) 2011-2019 Sparx Services North America. All rights reserved. www.sparxsystems.us
' v1.1: 20190610: 1. Updated to allow for different metatypes at different levels (with new HierarchyLevel.elementMetatype property). ' 2. Updated to allow specifying object dimenisions at different levels (with new HierarchyLevel properties). ' 3. Added new base parameter to specify diagram type (instead of always defaulting to "Package"). ' 4. Added new base parameter to sepcify whether diagram should be open while building. Diagrams are created ' more quickly if they are not opened. ' 5. Updated so diagrams that are children of elements are marked as the composite diagram.
!INC Local Scripts.EAConstants-VBScript !INC BIZBOK Diagram Utility Scripts.Set Diagram Styles !INC BIZBOK Diagram Utility Scripts.Color Constants
const HIERARCHY_TAB = "Nested Hierarchy Diagram"
const TOP_DOWN_FLOW_DIRECTION = 1 ' as Integer const LEFT_RIGHT_FLOW_DIRECTION = 2 ' as Integer
const ELEMENT_SUBTYPE_COMPOSITE = 8
const XREF_NAME_DEFAULT_DIAGRAM = "DefaultDiagram" const XREF_TYPE_ELEMENT = "element property" const XREF_VISIBILITY_PUBLIC = "public"
class HierarchyDiagram
public objectHeight ' as Integer public objectWidth ' as Integer public horizOffset ' as Integer public horizSpace ' as Integer public vertOffset ' as Integer public vertSpace ' as Integer public seqIndex ' as Integer public levelList ' as Scripting.Dictionary(Of HierarchyLevel) public childObjectList ' as Scripting.Dictionary(Of HierarchyObject) public parentItem ' as EA.Package/Element public diagram ' as EA.Diagram
private sub Class_Initialize
seqIndex = 9999 set levelList = nothing set childObjectList = nothing set parentItem = nothing set diagram = nothing
end sub
public sub createDiagram( diagramType)
dim diagramName 'as String
diagramName = parentItem.Name
set diagram = parentItem.Diagrams.AddNew( diagramName, diagramType)
diagram.Update
setDiagramStyle diagram, "HideEStereo=1"
setParentElement
end sub
public sub loadRootObjectList
dim rootObject ' as HierarchyObject dim rootLevel ' as HierarchyLevel dim elementMetatype ' as String
set rootLevel = levelList.Item(1)
elementMetatype = rootLevel.elementMetatype
set childObjectList = createParentHierarchyObjectList( Me, parentItem, elementMetatype)
for each rootObject in childObjectList.Items
set rootObject.diagram = Me
Repository.WriteOutput HIERARCHY_TAB, "--> Loading Root Element '" & rootObject.element.Name & "'...", 0
if levelList.Count > 1 then rootObject.LoadChildObjectList end if
next
end sub
public sub drawRootObjects
dim rootObject ' as HierarchyObject
drawObjectList Me, childObjectList, 1
for each rootObject in childObjectList.Items rootObject.drawChildObjects next
diagram.Update
end sub
public sub hideConnectors
dim link ' as EA.DiagramLink
for each link in diagram.DiagramLinks link.IsHidden = true link.Update next
diagram.DiagramLinks.Refresh
end sub
public sub addObject( anObject)
dim nextSeqIndex ' as Integer
set anObject.diagram = Me
set anObject.diagramObject = Me.diagram.DiagramObjects.AddNew("", "")
anObject.diagramObject.ElementID = anObject.element.ElementID
nextSeqIndex = Me.SeqIndex - 1
anObject.diagramObject.sequence = nextSeqIndex
Me.seqIndex = nextSeqIndex
end sub
private sub setParentElement()
if parentItem.ObjectType = otElement then
diagram.ParentID = parentItem.ElementID diagram.PackageID = parentItem.PackageID diagram.Update()
parentItem.Subtype = ELEMENT_SUBTYPE_COMPOSITE parentItem.Update()
setElementPDATA parentItem, 1, diagram.DiagramID
insertXrefRow XREF_NAME_DEFAULT_DIAGRAM, XREF_TYPE_ELEMENT, XREF_VISIBILITY_PUBLIC, vbNullString, "0", vbNullString, parentItem.ElementGUID, diagram.DiagramGUID
End If
End Sub
end Class
private sub setElementPDATA(element, PDATAIndex, PDATAValue)
dim SQLString 'As String dim PDATAColumnName 'As String
PDATAColumnName = "PDATA" & PDATAIndex
SQLString = "UPDATE t_object SET " & PDATAColumnName & "='" & PDATAValue & "' WHERE Object_ID = " & element.ElementID
Repository.Execute(SQLString)
element.Refresh()
end sub
private sub insertXrefRow(name, xrefType, visibility, behavior, partition, description, client, supplier)
dim typeLib ' as TypeLib Dim SQLString 'as String Dim xrefGUID 'as String
set typeLib = CreateObject("Scriptlet.TypeLib")
xrefGUID = typeLib.Guid xrefGUID= Left( xrefGUID, Len( xrefGUID) - 2)
SQLString = "INSERT INTO t_xref (XrefID, Name, Type, Visibility, Behavior, Partition, Description, Client, Supplier) VALUES (" SQLString = SQLString & "'" & xrefGUID & "', " SQLString = SQLString & "'" & name & "', " SQLString = SQLString & "'" & xrefType & "', " SQLString = SQLString & "'" & visibility & "', " SQLString = SQLString & "'" & behavior & "', " SQLString = SQLString & "'" & partition & "', " SQLString = SQLString & "'" & description & "', " SQLString = SQLString & "'" & client & "', " SQLString = SQLString & "'" & supplier & "')" Repository.WriteOutput HIERARCHY_TAB, SQLString, 0 Repository.Execute(SQLString)
end sub
class HierarchyLevel
public levelNumber ' as Integer public numObjects ' as Integer = numRows when flowDirection = TOP_DOWN; = numColumns when flowDirection = LEFT_RIGHT public flowDirection ' as Integer public objectStyle ' as ObjectStyle public elementMetatype ' as String public objectHeight ' as Integer public objectWidth ' as Integer public horizOffset ' as Integer public horizSpace ' as Integer public vertOffset ' as Integer public vertSpace ' as Integer
private sub Class_Initialize
set objectStyle = new HierarchyObjectStyle objectHeight = -1 objectWidth = -1 horizOffset = -1 horizSpace = -1 vertOffset = -1 vertSpace = -1
end sub
End Class
class HierarchyObjectStyle
public fillColor ' as RGB/Integer public lineWidth ' as Integer public lineColor ' as RGB/Integer public fontName ' as String public fontSize ' as Integer public fontColor ' as RGB/Integer public fontBold ' as Boolean public fontItalic ' as Boolean public fontUnderline ' as Boolean
End Class
class HierarchyObject
public levelNumber ' as Integer public row ' as Integer public column ' as Integer public parentObject ' as HierarchyObject public childObjectList ' as Scripting.Dictionary(Of HierarchyObject) public diagram ' as HierarchyDiagram public element ' as EA.Element public diagramObject ' as EA.DiagramObject
private sub Class_Initialize
set parentObject = nothing set childObjectList = nothing set diagram = nothing set diagramObject = nothing
end sub
public sub loadChildObjectList
dim eaElement ' as EA.Element dim childObject ' as HierarchyObject dim childLevel ' as HierarchyLevel dim childMetatype ' as String
set childLevel = diagram.levelList.Item(levelNumber + 1)
childMetatype = childLevel.elementMetatype
set childObjectList = CreateObject("Scripting.Dictionary")
for each eaElement in element.Elements
if eaElement.MetaType = childMetatype then
set childObject = New HierarchyObject
set childObject.element = eaElement set childObject.parentObject = Me set childObject.diagram = diagram childObject.levelNumber = levelNumber + 1
childObjectList.Add childObject.element.ElementGUID, childObject
Repository.WriteOutput HIERARCHY_TAB, String(childObject.levelNumber * 2, "-") & "> Loading Child Element '" & childObject.element.Name & "'...", 0
if childObject.levelNumber = diagram.levelList.Count then set childObject.childObjectList = Nothing else childObject.loadChildObjectList end if
end if
next
end sub
public sub drawChildObjects
dim childObject ' as HierarchyObject
if not childObjectList is Nothing then
drawObjectList diagram, childObjectList, levelNumber + 1
for each childObject in childObjectList.Items childObject.drawChildObjects next
end if
end sub
public sub resize( childObject)
dim objectCurrRight ' as Integer dim objectCurrBottom ' as Integer dim objectNewRight ' as Integer dim objectNewBottom ' as Integer dim level ' as HierarchyLevel dim vertSpace ' as Integer dim horizSpace ' as Integer
set level = diagram.levelList.Item(levelNumber)
if level.vertSpace = -1 then vertSpace = diagram.vertSpace else vertSpace = level.vertSpace end if
if level.horizSpace = -1 then horizSpace = diagram.horizSpace else horizSpace = level.horizSpace end if
objectCurrRight = diagramObject.right objectCurrBottom = diagramObject.bottom
objectNewRight = childObject.diagramObject.right + horizSpace objectNewBottom = childObject.diagramObject.bottom - vertSpace
if objectCurrRight <> objectNewRight or objectCurrBottom <> objectNewBottom then
if objectNewRight > objectCurrRight then diagramObject.right = objectNewRight end if
if objectNewBottom < objectCurrBottom then diagramObject.bottom = objectNewBottom end if
Repository.WriteOutput HIERARCHY_TAB, "*** RESIZED object '" & element.name & "' to (" & diagramObject.left & "," & diagramObject.top & ") x ( " & diagramObject.right & "," & diagramObject.bottom & ")", 0
diagramObject.Update Repository.ReloadDiagram(diagram.diagram.DiagramID)
moveNeighborObjects
if Not parentObject is nothing then
if TypeName(parentObject) = "HierarchyObject" Then parentObject.resize Me end if
end if
end if
end sub
public sub moveNeighborObjects
dim rightObject ' as HierarchyObject dim rightObjectWidth ' as Integer dim rightObjectCurrLeft ' as Integer dim rightObjectNewLeft ' as Integer dim rightObjectMoved ' as Integer dim bottomObject ' as HierarchyObject dim bottomObjectHeight ' as Integer dim bottomObjectCurrTop ' as Integer dim bottomObjectNewTop ' as Integer dim bottomObjectMoved ' as Integer dim level ' as HierarchyLevel dim vertSpace ' as Integer dim horizSpace ' as Integer
set level = diagram.levelList.Item(levelNumber)
if level.vertSpace = -1 then vertSpace = diagram.vertSpace else vertSpace = level.vertSpace end if
if level.horizSpace = -1 then horizSpace = diagram.horizSpace else horizSpace = level.horizSpace end if
set rightObject = getRightObject set bottomObject = getBottomObject
rightObjectMoved = false bottomObjectMoved = false
if rightObject is nothing then
if TypeName(parentObject) = "HierarchyObject" then parentObject.resize Me end if
else
rightObjectWidth = rightObject.width
rightObjectCurrLeft = rightObject.diagramObject.left
rightObjectNewLeft = diagramObject.right + horizSpace
if rightObjectNewLeft <> rightObjectCurrLeft then
rightObject.diagramObject.left = rightObjectNewLeft rightObject.diagramObject.right = rightObjectNewLeft + rightObjectWidth
Repository.WriteOutput HIERARCHY_TAB, "*** Moved RIGHT object '" & rightObject.element.name & "' to (" & rightObject.diagramObject.left & "," & rightObject.diagramObject.top & ") x ( " & rightObject.diagramObject.right & "," & rightObject.diagramObject.bottom & ")", 0
rightObject.diagramObject.Update Repository.ReloadDiagram(diagram.diagram.DiagramID)
rightObjectMoved = true
end if
end if
if bottomObject is nothing then
if TypeName(parentObject) = "HierarchyObject" then parentObject.resize Me end if
else
bottomObjectHeight = bottomObject.Height
bottomObjectCurrTop = bottomObject.diagramObject.top
bottomObjectNewTop = diagramObject.bottom - vertSpace
if bottomObjectNewTop <> bottomObjectCurrTop then
bottomObject.diagramObject.top = bottomObjectNewTop bottomObject.diagramObject.bottom = bottomObjectNewTop - bottomObjectHeight
Repository.WriteOutput HIERARCHY_TAB, "*** Moved BOTTOM object '" & bottomObject.element.name & "' to (" & bottomObject.diagramObject.left & "," & bottomObject.diagramObject.top & ") x ( " & bottomObject.diagramObject.right & "," & bottomObject.diagramObject.bottom & ")", 0
bottomObject.diagramObject.Update Repository.ReloadDiagram(diagram.diagram.DiagramID)
bottomObjectMoved = true
end if
end if
if rightObjectMoved then rightObject.moveNeighborObjects end if
if bottomObjectMoved then bottomObject.moveNeighborObjects end if
end sub
public property get height height = diagramObject.top - diagramObject.bottom end property
public property get width width = diagramObject.right - diagramObject.left end property
public function getRightObject set getRightObject = getGridObject(column + 1, row) end function
public function getBottomObject set getBottomObject = getGridObject(column, row + 1) end function
public function getGridObject( getColumn, getRow)
dim peerObject ' as HierarchyObject dim foundObject ' as HierarchyObject
set foundObject = nothing
for each peerObject in parentObject.childObjectList.Items
if peerObject.column = getColumn and peerObject.row = getRow then set foundObject = peerObject exit for end if
next
set getGridObject = foundObject
end function
public property let fillColor( value) if value <> vbNullString then SetDiagramObjectStyle Me.diagramObject, "BCol=" & value end if end property
public property let lineWidth( value) SetDiagramObjectStyle Me.diagramObject, "LWth=" & value end property
public property let lineColor( value) SetDiagramObjectStyle Me.diagramObject, "LCol=" & value end property
public property let fontName( value) SetDiagramObjectStyle Me.diagramObject, "font=" & value end property
public property let fontSize( value) SetDiagramObjectStyle Me.diagramObject, "fontsz=" & value * 10 end property
public property let fontColor( value) SetDiagramObjectStyle Me.diagramObject, "BFol=" & value end property
public property let fontBold( value) SetDiagramObjectStyle Me.diagramObject, "bold=" & value end property
public property let fontItalic( value) SetDiagramObjectStyle Me.diagramObject, "italic=" & value end property
public property let fontUnderline( value) SetDiagramObjectStyle Me.diagramObject, "ul=" & value end property
End Class
public sub drawObjectList( diagram, objectList, levelNumber)
dim level ' as HierarchyLevel dim objectIndex ' as Integer dim coord1 ' as Integer dim coord2 ' as Integer dim object ' as HierarchyObject dim parentObjectLeft ' as Integer dim parentObjectTop ' as Integer dim objectWidth ' as Integer dim objectHeight ' as Integer dim vertOffset ' as Integer dim vertSpace ' as Integer dim horizOffset ' as Integer dim horizSpace ' as Integer
set level = diagram.levelList.Item(levelNumber)
if level.objectWidth = -1 then objectWidth = diagram.objectWidth else objectWidth = level.objectWidth end if
if level.objectHeight = -1 then objectHeight = diagram.objectHeight else objectHeight = level.objectHeight end if
if level.vertOffset = -1 then vertOffset = diagram.vertOffset else vertOffset = level.vertOffset end if
if level.vertSpace = -1 then vertSpace = diagram.vertSpace else vertSpace = level.vertSpace end if
if level.horizOffset = -1 then horizOffset = diagram.horizOffset else horizOffset = level.horizOffset end if
if level.horizSpace = -1 then horizSpace = diagram.horizSpace else horizSpace = level.horizSpace end if
objectIndex = 1
for each object in objectList.Items
diagram.addObject object
coord1 = Int( ( objectIndex - 1 ) / level.numObjects ) + 1 coord2 = objectIndex - ( coord1 - 1 ) * level.numObjects
if level.flowDirection = LEFT_RIGHT_FLOW_DIRECTION then object.row = coord1 object.column = coord2 else object.row = coord2 object.column = coord1 end if
Repository.WriteOutput HIERARCHY_TAB, String(object.levelNumber * 2, "-") & "> Adding diagram object for Element '" & object.element.Name & "' #" & objectIndex & " ( " & object.column & ", " & object.row & " )", 0
if object.parentObject is nothing then parentObjectLeft = 0 parentObjectTop = 0 else
if TypeName(object.ParentObject) = "HierarchyObject" then parentObjectLeft = object.parentObject.diagramObject.left parentObjectTop = object.parentObject.diagramObject.top else parentObjectLeft = 0 parentObjectTop = 0 end if
end if
object.diagramObject.left = parentObjectLeft + ( object.column - 1 ) * ( objectWidth + horizSpace ) + horizOffset object.diagramObject.top = parentObjectTop - ( ( object.row - 1 ) * ( objectHeight + vertSpace ) + vertOffset ) object.diagramObject.right = object.diagramObject.left + objectWidth object.diagramObject.bottom = object.diagramObject.top - objectHeight
object.fillColor = level.objectStyle.fillColor object.lineWidth = level.objectStyle.lineWidth object.lineColor = level.objectStyle.lineColor object.fontName = level.objectStyle.fontName object.fontSize = level.objectStyle.fontSize object.fontColor = level.objectStyle.fontColor object.fontBold = level.objectStyle.fontBold object.fontItalic = level.objectStyle.fontItalic object.fontUnderline = level.objectStyle.fontUnderline
Repository.WriteOutput HIERARCHY_TAB, String(object.levelNumber * 2, "-") & "> LeftTop: ( " & object.diagramObject.left & ", " & object.diagramObject.top & " ) RightBottom: ( " & object.diagramObject.right & ", " & object.diagramObject.bottom & " )", 0
object.diagramObject.Update
Repository.ReloadDiagram(object.diagram.diagram.DiagramID)
if Not object.parentObject is Nothing then
if TypeName(object.parentObject) = "HierarchyObject" then object.parentObject.resize object end if
end if
objectIndex = objectIndex + 1
next
end sub
sub createNestedHierarchyDiagram( parentItem, levelList, diagramType, openDiagram )
dim diagram ' as HierarchyDiagram
Repository.CreateOutputTab HIERARCHY_TAB Repository.EnsureOutputVisible HIERARCHY_TAB
Repository.WriteOutput HIERARCHY_TAB, "Creating nested hierarchy diagram for Element '" & parentItem.Name & "'...", 0
set diagram = New HierarchyDiagram
'diagram.elementMetaType = elementMetatype diagram.horizOffset = 10 diagram.horizSpace = 10 diagram.vertOffset = 50 diagram.vertSpace = 10 diagram.objectHeight = 50 diagram.objectWidth = 150 set diagram.parentItem = parentItem
diagram.createDiagram diagramType
if openDiagram then Repository.OpenDiagram(diagram.diagram.DiagramID) end if
set diagram.levelList = levelList
Repository.WriteOutput HIERARCHY_TAB, "diagram.levelList.Count = " & diagram.levelList.count, 0
diagram.loadRootObjectList
diagram.drawRootObjects
diagram.hideConnectors
Repository.SaveDiagram(diagram.diagram.diagramID)
if openDiagram then Repository.ReloadDiagram(diagram.diagram.DiagramID) end if
Repository.WriteOutput HIERARCHY_TAB, "Finished!", 0
end sub
function createParentHierarchyObjectList( diagram, parentItem, elementMetatype)
dim objectList dim eaElement as EA.Element dim object
set objectList = CreateObject("Scripting.Dictionary")
for each eaElement in parentItem.Elements
if eaElement.MetaType = elementMetatype then
set object = New HierarchyObject
set object.Element = eaElement set object.ParentObject = diagram object.levelNumber = 1
objectList.Add object.element.ElementGUID, object
end if
next
set createParentHierarchyObjectList = objectList
end function

Column.name: Script
Column.value:
' Scripts to update styles diagram objects. ' ' Copyright (c) 2011-2018 Sparx Services North America. All rights reserved. www.sparxsystems.us
const STYLE_DELIMITER = ";" const STYLE_ASSIGNMENT = "="
sub SetCurrentDiagramObjectsStyle(elementMetaType, updateStyleList)
dim theDiagram as EA.Diagram
set theDiagram = Repository.GetCurrentDiagram
theDiagram.Update
SetDiagramObjectsStyle theDiagram, elementMetaType, updateStyleList
theDiagram.Update
end sub
sub SetDiagramObjectsStyle( theDiagram, elementMetaType, updateStyleList)
dim diagramObject as EA.DiagramObject dim diagramElement as EA.Element dim elementID dim updateStyleArray dim updateStyle
updateStyleArray = Split(updateStyleList, STYLE_DELIMITER)
for each diagramObject in theDiagram.DiagramObjects
elementID = diagramObject.ElementID
set diagramElement = Repository.GetElementByID(elementID)
if diagramElement.metaType = elementMetaType then
for each updateStyle in updateStyleArray SetDiagramObjectStyle diagramObject, updateStyle next
diagramObject.Update
end if
next
Repository.ReloadDiagram theDiagram.DiagramID
end sub
sub SetDiagramObjectStyle( diagramObject, updateStyle)
dim updateStylePartArray dim updateStyleName dim lineStyleList dim lineStyleArray dim lineStyleIndex dim lineStyle dim styleFound
updateStylePartArray = Split(updateStyle, STYLE_ASSIGNMENT)
updateStyleName = updateStylePartArray(0)
lineStyleList = diagramObject.Style
lineStyleArray = Split(lineStyleList, STYLE_DELIMITER)
lineStyleIndex = 0 styleFound = false
for each lineStyle in lineStyleArray
if InStr( lineStyle, updateStyleName & STYLE_ASSIGNMENT) then
lineStyle = updateStyle
lineStyleArray(lineStyleIndex) = lineStyle
styleFound = true
end if
lineStyleIndex = lineStyleIndex + 1
next
lineStyleList = Join(lineStyleArray, STYLE_DELIMITER)
if not( styleFound) then lineStyleList = lineStyleList & updateStyle & STYLE_DELIMITER end if
diagramObject.Style = lineStyleList
end sub
sub SetDiagramStyle( diagram, updateStyle)
dim updateStylePartArray dim updateStyleName dim lineStyleList dim lineStyleArray dim lineStyleIndex dim lineStyle dim styleFound
updateStylePartArray = Split(updateStyle, STYLE_ASSIGNMENT)
updateStyleName = updateStylePartArray(0)
lineStyleList = diagram.ExtendedStyle
lineStyleArray = Split(lineStyleList, STYLE_DELIMITER)
lineStyleIndex = 0 styleFound = false
for each lineStyle in lineStyleArray
if InStr( lineStyle, updateStyleName & STYLE_ASSIGNMENT) then
lineStyle = updateStyle
lineStyleArray(lineStyleIndex) = lineStyle
styleFound = true
end if
lineStyleIndex = lineStyleIndex + 1
next
lineStyleList = Join(lineStyleArray, STYLE_DELIMITER)
if not( styleFound) then lineStyleList = lineStyleList & updateStyle & STYLE_DELIMITER end if
diagram.ExtendedStyle = lineStyleList
end sub

'level3.objectStyle.fillColor = colorLightCoral 'level3.objectStyle.lineWidth = 1 'level3.objectStyle.lineColor = colorBlack 'level3.objectStyle.fontName = "Arial" 'level3.objectStyle.fontSize = 10 'level3.objectStyle.fontColor = colorBlack
'levelList.Add 3, level3
' *** FOURTH LEVEL ***
'set level4 = New HierarchyLevel
'level4.numObjects = 2 'level4.flowDirection = LEFT_RIGHT_FLOW_DIRECTION
'level4.objectStyle.fillColor = colorLightSkyBlue 'level4.objectStyle.lineWidth = 1 'level4.objectStyle.lineColor = colorBlack 'level4.objectStyle.fontName = "Arial" 'level4.objectStyle.fontSize = 10 'level4.objectStyle.fontColor = colorBlack
'levelList.Add 4, level4
set getDiagramLevelList = levelList
end function

Column.name: Notes
Column.value: <Script Name="Connector -> Map Diagram Elements" Type="Internal" Language="VBScript"/>

Column.name: Script
Column.value:
' ' Script to create new relationships between a single selected element on a diagram and all other elements on the same diagram. ' ' Copyright (c) 2011-2016: Sparx Services North America. All rights reserved. www.sparxsystems.us ' option explicit
!INC Local Scripts.EAConstants-VBScript
sub onDiagramScript()
dim currentDiagram as EA.Diagram dim selectedObjectList as EA.Collection dim selectedObject as EA.DiagramObject dim connType ' as String dim connStereotype ' as String
set currentDiagram = Repository.GetCurrentDiagram()
if not currentDiagram is nothing then
Repository.SaveDiagram currentDiagram.DiagramID
set selectedObjectList = currentDiagram.SelectedObjects
if selectedObjectList.Count = 1 then
connType = InputBox("Enter mapped connector type:", , "Dependency")
if not IsEmpty( connType) then
connStereotype = InputBox("Enter mapped connector stereotype:", , "Impacts")
if not IsEmpty( connStereotype) then
set selectedObject = selectedObjectList.GetAt(0)
mapDiagramElements currentDiagram, selectedObject, connType, connStereotype
end if
end if
else Session.Prompt "Must select at least one (and only one) element on this diagram.", promptOK end if else Session.Prompt "This script requires a diagram to be visible", promptOK end if
end sub
sub mapDiagramElements( diagram, selectedDiagramObject, connType, connStereotype)
dim selectedElementID ' as Integer dim selectedElement as EA.Element dim relatedDiagramObject as EA.DiagramObject dim relatedElementID ' as Integer dim relatedElement as EA.Element
diagram.Update
Session.Output vbCRLF & "Map Diagram Elements"
selectedElementID = selectedDiagramObject.ElementID
set selectedElement = Repository.GetElementByID( selectedElementID)
for each relatedDiagramObject in diagram.DiagramObjects
if relatedDiagramObject.ElementID <> selectedDiagramObject.ElementID then
relatedElementID = relatedDiagramObject.ElementID
set relatedElement = Repository.GetElementByID(relatedElementID)
addConnector selectedElement, connType, connStereotype, relatedElement
end if
next
Repository.ReloadDiagram( diagram.DiagramID)
Session.Output "Finished!"
end sub
function addConnector( fromElement, connType, connStereotype, toElement)
dim newConnector as EA.Connector
Session.Output "- Creating new " & connStereotype & " " & connType & " relationship from " & fromElement.Name & " to " & toElement.Name & "..."
set newConnector = fromElement.Connectors.AddNew("", connType)
newConnector.Stereotype = connStereotype newConnector.SupplierID = toElement.ElementID
newConnector.Update
fromElement.Connectors.Refresh
set addConnector = newConnector
end function
onDiagramScript

Column.name: Notes
Column.value: <Script Name="Cloning -> Clone Element" Type="Internal" Language="VBScript"/>

Column.name: Script
Column.value:
' ' Diagram script to a new version of the selected elements on a diagram. This will create a copy of an element ' including its built-in properties, tagged values, relationships, child elements, and child diagrams. It will ' also create an <<clone>> generalization to the original version to represent its previous version. ' ' Copyright (c) 2011-2019: Sparx Services North America. All rights reserved. www.sparxsystems.us ' ' v1.1 20190306: - Updated to default cloned element to the same version as the diagram version. ' - Updated to enable canceling cloning by press Esc key from input dialog boxes. ' - Updated to use fully-qualified stereotype when creating new element and new connectors. ' v1.1.1 20191102: Factored out diagram copying routines to Clone Routines so they can be reused
option explicit
!INC Local Scripts.EAConstants-VBScript !INC SSNA Diagram Script Utilities.Clone Routines
dim lockError ' as Boolean dim currDiagram as EA.Diagram
sub Start()
set currDiagram = Repository.GetCurrentDiagram
if currDiagram is nothing then Session.Prompt "This script requires a diagram to be visible", promptOK else if currDiagram.IsLocked then Session.Prompt "Cannot clone elements on locked diagram", promptOK else currDiagram.Update CopyDiagramElements currDiagram end if end if
end sub
sub CopyDiagramElements( currDiagram)
dim currDiagramObject as EA.DiagramObject dim diagramPackageID
diagramPackageID = currDiagram.PackageID
for each currDiagramObject in currDiagram.SelectedObjects CreateDiagramObjectCopy currDiagram, currDiagramObject exit for ' only do the first selected element next
currDiagram.Update()
Repository.ReloadDiagram( currDiagram.DiagramID)
end sub
sub CreateDiagramObjectCopy( currDiagram, currDiagramObject)
dim cancel 'as Boolean dim currElementID ' as Integer dim currElement as EA.Element dim diagramPackageID ' as Integer dim diagramPackage as EA.Package dim newElementName ' as String dim newElementVersion ' as String dim newElement as EA.Element
lockError = false cancel = false
currElementID = currDiagramObject.ElementID
set currElement = Repository.GetElementByID( currElementID)
newElementName = InputBox( "Current element name is '" & currElement.Name & "'." & vbCRLF & vbCRLF & "Enter new element name:", "New Element Name", currElement.Name)
if IsEmpty( newElementName) then cancel = true end if
if not cancel then
newElementVersion = InputBox( "Current element version is '" & currElement.Version & "'." & vbCRLF & vbCRLF & "Enter new element version:", "New Element Version", currDiagram.Version)
if IsEmpty( newElementVersion) then cancel = true end if
end if
if cancel then MsgBox "Element cloning has been canceled." else
diagramPackageID = currDiagram.PackageID
set diagramPackage = Repository.GetPackageByID( diagramPackageID)
set newElement = diagramPackage.Elements.AddNew( currElement.Name, currElement.Type)
Repository.EnsureOutputVisible "Script"
Session.Output String( 40, "-") Session.Output "Creating clone of '" & currElement.Name & "'..."
CloneElement currElement, newElement, newElementName, newElementVersion
SwapDiagramObject currDiagram, currDiagramObject, currElement, newElement
if lockError then Session.Prompt "One or more relationhips could not be cloned due to locking restrictions." & vbCRLF & vbCRLF & "Examine the Script tab of the System Output window for details.", promptOK end if
Session.Output "Finished!"
end if
end sub
sub CloneElement( currElement, newElement, newElementName, newElementVersion)
dim extendConn as EA.Connector dim clonedGUIDTag as EA.TaggedValue
'CloneElementParent currElement
CopyElementProperties currElement, newElement, newElementName, newElementVersion
Repository.EnsureOutputVisible "Script"
'CopyElementAttributes 'CopyElementConstraints 'CopyElementCustomProperties 'CopyElementEfforts 'CopyElementFiles 'CopyElementIssues 'CopyElementMethods 'CopyElementMetrics 'CopyElementPartitions 'CopyElementRequirements 'CopyElementResources 'CopyElementRisks 'CopyElementScenarios 'CopyElementStateTransitions 'CopyElementTemplateParameters 'CopyElementTests
CopyElementTaggedValues currElement, newElement
CopyElementConnectors currElement, newElement
CopyElementDiagrams currElement, newElement
'CloneElementEmbeddedElements currElement, newElement 'CloneElementChildren currElement, newElement 'CloneStateMachines currElement, newElement
set extendConn = newElement.Connectors.AddNew( "", CLONE_TYPE)
extendConn.SupplierID = currElement.ElementID extendConn.Direction = "Source -> Destination" extendConn.Stereotype = CLONE_STEREOTYPE
extendConn.Update
newElement.Connectors.Refresh
set clonedGUIDTag = newElement.TaggedValues.GetByName( CLONED_GUID)
if clonedGUIDTag is nothing then set clonedGUIDTag = newElement.TaggedValues.AddNew( CLONED_GUID, "") end if
clonedGUIDTag.Value = currElement.ElementGUID
clonedGUIDTag.Update
newElement.TaggedValues.Refresh
end sub
sub CloneElementChildren( currElement, newElement)
dim currChildElement as EA.Element dim newChildElement as EA.Element
if currElement.Elements.Count > 0 then
Session.Output String( 2, ".") & "Child Elements"
for each currChildElement in currElement.Elements
set newChildElement = newElement.Elements.AddNew( currElement.Name, currElement.Type)
CloneElement currChildElement, newChildElement
next
end if
end sub
sub CopyElementProperties( currElement, newElement, newElementName, newElementVersion)
newElement.Name = newElementName newElement.Version = newElementVersion
newElement.Abstract = currElement.Abstract newElement.ActionFlags = currElement.ActionFlags newElement.Alias = currElement.Alias newElement.ClassifierID = currElement.ClassifierID newElement.Complexity = currElement.Complexity newElement.Difficulty = currElement.Difficulty newElement.EventFlags = currElement.EventFlags newElement.ExtensionPoints = currElement.ExtensionPoints newElement.Genfile = currElement.Genfile newElement.Genlinks = currElement.Genlinks newElement.Gentype = currElement.Gentype newElement.Header1 = currElement.Header1 newElement.Header2 = currElement.Header2 newElement.IsActive = currElement.IsActive newElement.IsLeaf = currElement.IsLeaf newElement.IsNew = currElement.IsNew newElement.IsRoot = currElement.IsRoot newElement.IsSpec = currElement.IsSpec newElement.Multiplicity = currElement.Multiplicity newElement.Notes = currElement.Notes newElement.Persistence = currElement.Persistence newElement.Phase = currElement.Phase newElement.Priority = currElement.Priority newElement.PropertyType = currElement.PropertyType newElement.RunState = currElement.RunState newElement.Status = currElement.Status newElement.StereotypeEx = currElement.FQStereotype newElement.StyleEx = currElement.StyleEx newElement.Subtype = currElement.Subtype newElement.Tablespace = currElement.Tablespace newElement.Tag = currElement.Tag newElement.Visibility = currElement.Visibility
newElement.Update
newElement.TaggedValues.Refresh
end sub
sub CopyElementTaggedValues( currElement, newElement)
dim currTaggedValue as EA.TaggedValue dim newTaggedValue as EA.TaggedValue
if currElement.TaggedValues.Count > 0 then
Session.Output String( 2, ".") & "Tagged Values"
for each currTaggedValue in currElement.TaggedValues
set newTaggedValue = newElement.TaggedValues.GetByName( currTaggedValue.Name)
if newTaggedValue is nothing then set newTaggedValue = newElement.TaggedValues.AddNew( currTaggedValue.Name,"") end if
newTaggedValue.Value = currTaggedValue.Value newTaggedValue.Notes = currTaggedValue.Notes
newTaggedValue.Update
next
end if
newElement.TaggedValues.Refresh
end sub
sub CopyElementConnectors( currElement, newElement)
dim currConnector as EA.Connector dim newConnector as EA.Connector dim clientEndLocked ' as Boolean dim clientElement as EA.Element dim lockMsg ' as String
if currElement.Connectors.Count > 0 then
Session.Output String( 2, ".") & "Connectors"
for each currConnector in currElement.Connectors
if not( currConnector.Type = CLONE_TYPE and currConnector.Stereotype = CLONE_STEREOTYPE) then
Session.Output String( 4, ".") & "Cloning Connector " & currConnector.ConnectorGUID & " (" & currConnector.ConnectorID & ") " & currConnector.Type & " <<" & currConnector.Stereotype & ">> "
'set newConnector = newElement.Connectors.AddNew( currConnector.Name, currConnector.Type) set newConnector = createNewConnector( currConnector, currElement, newElement)
'if currConnector.ClientID = currElement.ElementID then ' newConnector.ClientID = newElement.ElementID ' newConnector.SupplierID = currConnector.SupplierID ' clientEndLocked = false 'else
'if currElement.Locked then ' clientEndLocked = true 'else ' newConnector.ClientID = currConnector.ClientID ' newConnector.SupplierID = newElement.ElementID ' clientEndLocked = false 'end if
'end if
if clientEndLocked then
set clientElement = Repository.GetElementByID( currConnector.ClientID)
lockMsg = "Cannot create ┬" & currConnector.Stereotype & "┬╗ " & currConnector.Type lockMsg = lockMsg & " from LOCKED client element '" & clientElement.Name & "' ┬" & clientElement.Stereotype & "┬╗ " & clientElement.Type lockMsg = lockMsg & " to new cloned element."
Session.Output lockMsg
lockError = true
else CopyElementConnector currConnector, newConnector end if
end if
next
newElement.Connectors.Refresh
end if
end sub
function createNewConnector( currConnector, currElement, newElement)
dim newConnectorClientID ' as Integer dim newConnectorSupplierID ' as Integer dim sqlString ' as String dim typeLib ' as Scriptlet.TypeLib dim newGUID ' as String dim newConnector as EA.Connector dim testConnector as EA.Connector
if currConnector.ClientID = currElement.ElementID then newConnectorClientID = newElement.ElementID newConnectorSupplierID = currConnector.SupplierID else newConnectorClientID = currConnector.ClientID newConnectorSupplierID = newElement.ElementID end if
set typeLib = CreateObject( "Scriptlet.TypeLib")
newGUID = typeLib.Guid newGUID = Left( newGUID, Len( newGUID) - 2) ' remove null termination characters at end
sqlString = "INSERT INTO t_connector " sqlString = sqlString & "(Name, Direction, Connector_Type, Start_Object_ID, End_Object_ID, ea_guid, "
if currConnector.Stereotype <> "" then sqlString = sqlString & "Stereotype, " end if
sqlString = sqlString & "PDATA1, PDATA2, PDATA3, PDATA4, PDATA5) " sqlString = sqlString & "VALUES (" sqlString = sqlString & "'" & currConnector.Name & "', " sqlString = sqlString & "'" & currConnector.Direction & "', " sqlString = sqlString & "'" & currConnector.Type & "', " sqlString = sqlString & newConnectorClientID & ", " sqlString = sqlString & newConnectorSupplierID & ", " sqlString = sqlString & "'" & newGUID & "', "
if currConnector.Stereotype <> "" then sqlString = sqlString & "'" & currConnector.Stereotype & "', " end if
sqlString = sqlString & "'" & currConnector.MiscData(0) & "', " sqlString = sqlString & "'" & currConnector.MiscData(1) & "', " sqlString = sqlString & "'" & currConnector.MiscData(2) & "', " sqlString = sqlString & "'" & currConnector.MiscData(3) & "', " sqlString = sqlString & "'" & currConnector.MiscData(4) & "')"
Repository.Execute sqlString
set createNewConnector = Repository.GetConnectorByGuid( newGUID)
'currElement.Connectors.Refresh
'set newConnector = nothing
'for each testConnector in currElement.Connectors ' if testConnector.ConnectorGUID = newGUID then ' set newConnector = testConnector ' exit for ' end if 'next
'set createNewConnector = newConnector
end function
sub CopyElementConnector( currConnector, newConnector)
dim clonedGUIDTag as EA.ConnectorTag
newConnector.Alias = currConnector.Alias newConnector.Color = currConnector.Color newConnector.DiagramID = currConnector.DiagramID newConnector.Direction = currConnector.Direction newConnector.EndPointX = currConnector.EndPointX newConnector.EndPointY = currConnector.EndPointY newConnector.EventFlags = currConnector.EventFlags newConnector.IsLeaf = currConnector.IsLeaf newConnector.IsRoot = currConnector.IsRoot newConnector.IsSpec = currConnector.IsSpec newConnector.Notes = currConnector.Notes newConnector.RouteStyle = currConnector.RouteStyle newConnector.SequenceNo = currConnector.SequenceNo newConnector.StartPointX = currConnector.StartPointX newConnector.StartPointY = currConnector.StartPointY newConnector.StateFlags = currConnector.StateFlags newConnector.StereotypeEx = currConnector.FQStereotype newConnector.StyleEx = currConnector.StyleEx newConnector.Subtype = currConnector.Subtype newConnector.TransitionAction = currConnector.TransitionAction newConnector.TransitionEvent = currConnector.TransitionEvent newConnector.TransitionGuard = currConnector.TransitionGuard newConnector.VirtualInheritance = currConnector.VirtualInheritance newConnector.Width = currConnector.Width
On Error Resume Next
newConnector.Update
if err.Number <> 0 then Session.Output "Error saving cloned connector: " & err.Description end if
On Error Goto 0
CopyConnectorEnd currConnector.ClientEnd, newConnector.ClientEnd CopyConnectorEnd currConnector.SupplierEnd, newConnector.SupplierEnd
'CopyConnectorConstraints CopyConnectorConveyedItems currConnector, newConnector 'CopyConnectorMessageArguments CopyConnectorTaggedValues currConnector, newConnector 'CopyConnectorTemplateBindings
set clonedGUIDTag = newConnector.TaggedValues.GetByName( CLONED_GUID)
if clonedGUIDTag is nothing then set clonedGUIDTag = newConnector.TaggedValues.AddNew( CLONED_GUID, "") end if
clonedGUIDTag.Value = currConnector.ConnectorGUID
clonedGUIDTag.Update
newConnector.TaggedValues.Refresh
end sub
sub CopyConnectorEnd( currConnectorEnd, newConnectorEnd)
newConnectorEnd.Aggregation = currConnectorEnd.Aggregation newConnectorEnd.Alias = currConnectorEnd.Alias newConnectorEnd.AllowDuplicates = currConnectorEnd.AllowDuplicates newConnectorEnd.Cardinality = currConnectorEnd.Cardinality newConnectorEnd.Constraint = currConnectorEnd.Constraint newConnectorEnd.Containment = currConnectorEnd.Containment newConnectorEnd.Derived = currConnectorEnd.Derived newConnectorEnd.DerivedUnion = currConnectorEnd.DerivedUnion newConnectorEnd.IsChangeable = currConnectorEnd.IsChangeable newConnectorEnd.Navigable = currConnectorEnd.Navigable newConnectorEnd.Ordering = currConnectorEnd.Ordering newConnectorEnd.OwnedByClassifier = currConnectorEnd.OwnedByClassifier newConnectorEnd.Qualifier = currConnectorEnd.Qualifier newConnectorEnd.Role = currConnectorEnd.Role newConnectorEnd.RoleNote = currConnectorEnd.RoleNote newConnectorEnd.StereotypeEx = currConnectorEnd.StereotypeEx newConnectorEnd.Visibility = currConnectorEnd.Visibility
newConnectorEnd.Update
end sub
sub CopyConnectorConveyedItems( currConnector, newConnector)
dim conveyedItem as EA.Element
if currConnector.ConveyedItems.Count > 0 then
Session.Output String( 6, ".") & "Conveyed Items"
for each conveyedItem in currConnector.ConveyedItems newConnector.ConveyedItems.AddNew conveyedItem.ElementGUID, "" next
newConnector.ConveyedItems.Refresh
end if
end sub
sub CopyConnectorTaggedValues( currConnector, newConnector)
dim currTaggedValue as EA.ConnectorTag dim newTaggedValue as EA.ConnectorTag
if currConnector.TaggedValues.Count > 0 then
Session.Output String( 6, ".") & "Tagged Values"
for each currTaggedValue in currConnector.TaggedValues
set newTaggedValue = newConnector.TaggedValues.GetByName( currTaggedValue.Name)
if newTaggedValue is nothing then set newTaggedValue = newConnector.TaggedValues.AddNew( currTaggedValue.Name, "") end if
newTaggedValue.Value = currTaggedValue.Value newTaggedValue.Notes = currTaggedValue.Notes
newTaggedValue.Update
next
newConnector.TaggedValues.Refresh
end if
end sub
sub CopyElementDiagrams( currElement, newElement)
dim currDiagram as EA.Diagram
if currElement.Diagrams.Count > 0 then
Session.Output String( 2, ".") & "Diagrams"
for each currDiagram in currElement.Diagrams CopyElementDiagram currDiagram, newElement next
newElement.IsComposite = currElement.IsComposite
newElement.Update
newElement.Diagrams.Refresh
end if
end sub s Start

Column.name: Notes
Column.value: <Script Name="Cloning -> Replace Diagram Element" Type="Internal" Language="VBScript"/>

Column.name: Script
Column.value:
' ' Diagram script to replace the selected element on a diagram with the currently selected element in the ' project browser. ' ' Copyright (c) 2011-2016: Sparx Services North America. All rights reserved. www.sparxsystems.us
option explicit
!INC Local Scripts.EAConstants-VBScript !INC SSNA Diagram Script Utilities.Clone Routines
sub OnDiagramScript()
dim currDiagram as EA.Diagram dim selectedObjects as EA.Collection dim selectedDiagramObject as EA.DiagramObject dim selectedElements as EA.Collection dim selectedBrowserElement as EA.Element
set currDiagram = Repository.GetCurrentDiagram()
if not currDiagram is nothing then
set selectedObjects = currDiagram.SelectedObjects
if selectedObjects.Count = 1 then
set selectedDiagramObject = selectedObjects.GetAt(0)
set selectedElements = Repository.GetTreeSelectedElements
if selectedElements.Count = 1 then
set selectedBrowserElement = selectedElements.GetAt(0)
ReplaceDiagramElement currDiagram, selectedDiagramObject, selectedBrowserElement
else Session.Prompt "This script requires one (and only one) element to be selected in the Project Browser.", promptOK end if
else Session.Prompt "This script requires one (and only one) element to be selected on the diagram.", promptOK end if else Session.Prompt "This script requires a diagram to be visible", promptOK end if
end sub
sub ReplaceDiagramElement( currDiagram, currDiagramObject, newElement)
dim currElement as EA.Element
set currElement = Repository.GetElementByID( currDiagramObject.ElementID)
Repository.EnsureOutputVisible "Script"
Session.Output String( 40, "-") Session.Output "Replacing '" & currElement.Name & "' with '" & newELement.Name & "' on '" & currDiagram.Name & "' ..."
SwapDiagramObject currDiagram, currDiagramObject, currElement, newElement
Session.Output "Finished!"
end sub
OnDiagramScript

Column.name: Notes
Column.value: <Script Name="Clone Routines" Type="Internal" Language="VBScript"/>

Column.name: Script
Column.value:
' Common routines used in cloning and diagram object replacement.
' 20191102: Added diagram copy routines from main cloning script so they can be reused.
const CLONE_TYPE = "Dependency" ' as String const CLONE_STEREOTYPE = "clone" ' as String const CLONED_GUID = "_clonedGUID" ' as String
dim linkError ' as Boolean
sub SwapDiagramObject( currDiagram, currDiagramObject, currElement, newElement)
dim newDiagramObject as EA.DiagramObject
linkError = false
set newDiagramObject = CopyDiagramObject( currDiagramObject, currDiagram)
newDiagramObject.ElementID = newElement.ElementID
newDiagramObject.Update
CopyClonedDiagramLinks currDiagram, currElement, newElement
DeleteOriginalDiagramObject currDiagram, currDiagramObject
Repository.ReloadDiagram currDiagram.DiagramID
if linkError then Session.Prompt "One or more cloned relationships could not be found." & vbCRLF & vbCRLF & "Examine the Script tab of the System Output window for details.", promptOK end if
end sub
sub CopyClonedDiagramLinks( currDiagram, currElement, newElement)
dim newConnector as EA.Connector dim currConnector as EA.Connector dim currLink as EA.DiagramLink dim currConnectorID ' as Integer dim newLink as EA.DiagramLink
Session.Output String( 2, ".") & "Copying cloned diagram links"
for each newConnector in newElement.Connectors
if newConnector.Type <> CLONE_TYPE and newConnector.Stereotype <> CLONE_STEREOTYPE then
set currConnector = FindElementConnectorByGUID( currElement, newConnector)
if not( currConnector is nothing) then
for each currLink in currDiagram.DiagramLinks
if currLink.ConnectorID = currConnector.ConnectorID then
currLink.IsHidden = true currLink.Update
set newLink = CopyDiagramLink( currLink, currDiagram)
newLink.ConnectorID = newConnector.ConnectorID newLInk.IsHidden = false
newLink.Update
end if
next
end if
end if
next
currDiagram.DiagramLinks.Refresh
end sub
function FindElementConnectorByGUID( currElement, newConnector)
dim clonedConnectorGUIDTag as EA.ConnectorTag dim clonedConnectorGUID ' as String dim currConnector as EA.Connector dim connectorFound ' as Boolean
set clonedConnectorGUIDTag = newConnector.TaggedValues.GetByName( CLONED_GUID)
connectorFound = false
if clonedConnectorGUIDTag is nothing then
Session.Output "Cloned connector GUID tagged value missing from new connector " & newConnector.Type & " " & newConnector.ConnectorGUID & ". Unable to locate original connector."
linkError = true
else
clonedConnectorGUID = clonedConnectorGUIDTag.Value
for each currConnector in currElement.Connectors
if currConnector.ConnectorGUID = clonedConnectorGUID then connectorFound = true exit for end if
next
end if
if connectorFound then set FindElementConnectorByGUID = currConnector else set FindElementConnectorByGUID = nothing end if
end function
function getConnectorTaggedValue( connector, taggedValueName)
dim taggedValue as EA.ConnectorTag dim foundTaggedValue as EA.ConnectorTag
set foundTaggedValue = nothing
Session.Output "connector.TaggedValues.Count = " & connector.TaggedValues.Count
for each taggedValue in connector.TaggedValues
Session.Output "connector.taggedValue.Name = '" & taggedValue.Name & "'" if taggedValue.Name = taggedValueName then set foundTaggedValue = taggedValue exit for end if
next
set getConnectorTaggedValue = foundTaggedValue
end function
sub DeleteOriginalDiagramObject( currDiagram, origDiagramObject)
dim objectCount ' as Integer dim objectIndex ' as Integer dim currDiagramObject as EA.DiagramObject
objectCount = currDiagram.DiagramObjects.Count
for objectIndex = objectCount - 1 to 0 step -1
set currDiagramObject = currDiagram.DiagramObjects.GetAt( objectIndex)
if currDiagramObject.ElementID = origDiagramObject.ElementID then
currDiagram.DiagramObjects.DeleteAt objectIndex, false
exit for
end if
next
currDiagram.DiagramObjects.Refresh
end sub
function CopyDiagramObject( currDiagramObject, newDiagram)
dim newDiagramObject as EA.DiagramObject
set newDiagramObject = newDiagram.DiagramObjects.AddNew( "", "")
newDiagramObject.BackgroundColor = currDiagramObject.BackgroundColor newDiagramObject.BorderColor = currDiagramObject.BorderColor newDiagramObject.BorderLineWidth = currDiagramObject.BorderLineWidth newDiagramObject.bottom = currDiagramObject.bottom newDiagramObject.ElementDisplayMode = currDiagramObject.ElementDisplayMode newDiagramObject.ElementID = currDiagramObject.ElementID = currDiagramObject.FontUnderline newDiagramObject.IsSelectable = currDiagramObject.IsSelectable newDiagramObject.left = currDiagramObject.left newDiagramObject.right = currDiagramObject.right newDiagramObject.ShowFormattedNotes = currDiagramObject.ShowFormattedNotes newDiagramObject.ShowFullyQualifiedTags = currDiagramObject.ShowFullyQualifiedTags newDiagramObject.ShowInheritedAttributes = currDiagramObject.ShowInheritedAttributes newDiagramObject.ShowInheritedConstraints = currDiagramObject.ShowInheritedConstraints newDiagramObject.ShowInheritedOperations = currDiagramObject.ShowInheritedOperations newDiagramObject.ShowInheritedResponsibilities = currDiagramObject.ShowInheritedResponsibilities newDiagramObject.ShowInheritedTags = currDiagramObject.ShowPrivateAttributes newDiagramObject.ShowPrivateOperations = currDiagramObject.ShowPrivateAttributes newDiagramObject.ShowProtectedAttributes = currDiagramObject.ShowProtectedAttributes newDiagramObject.ShowProtectedOperations = currDiagramObject.ShowProtectedOperations newDiagramObject.ShowPublicAttributes = currDiagramObject.ShowPublicAttributes newDiagramObject.ShowPublicOperations = currDiagramObject.ShowPublicOperations newDiagramObject.ShowResponsibilities = currDiagramObject.ShowResponsibilities currDiagramObject.ShowTags newDiagramObject.Style = currDiagramObject.Style newDiagramObject.TextAlign = currDiagramObject.TextAlign newDiagramObject.top = currDiagramObject.top

function CopyDiagramLink( currLink, newDiagram)
dim newLink as EA.DiagramLink
set newLink = newDiagram.DiagramLinks.AddNew( "", "")
newLink.ConnectorID = currLink.ConnectorID newLink.Geometry = currLink.Geometry newLink.HiddenLabels = currLink.HiddenLabels newLink.IsHidden = currLink.IsHidden newLink.LineColor = currLink.LineColor newLink.LineStyle = currLink.LineStyle newLink.LineWidth = currLink.LineWidth newLink.Path = currLink.Path newLink.SuppressSegment = currLink.SuppressSegment newLink.Style = currLink.Style
set CopyDiagramLink = newLink
end function
function CopyElementDiagram( currDiagram, newElement)
dim newDiagram as EA.Diagram
Session.Output String( 4, ".") & "Diagram '" & currDiagram.Name & "'"
set newDiagram = newElement.Diagrams.AddNew( currDiagram.Name, currDiagram.Type)
newDiagram.cx = currDiagram.cx newDiagram.cy = currDiagram.cy newDiagram.ExtendedStyle = currDiagram.ExtendedStyle newDiagram.FilterElements = currDiagram.FilterElements newDiagram.HighlightImports = currDiagram.HighlightImports newDiagram.Notes = currDiagram.Notes newDiagram.Orientation = currDiagram.Orientation newDiagram.Scale = currDiagram.Scale newDiagram.ShowDetails = currDiagram.ShowDetails newDiagram.ShowPackageContents = currDiagram.ShowPackageContents newDiagram.ShowPrivate = currDiagram.ShowPrivate newDiagram.ShowProtected = currDiagram.ShowProtected newDiagram.ShowPublic = currDiagram.ShowPublic newDiagram.Stereotype = currDiagram.Stereotype newDiagram.StyleEx = currDiagram.StyleEx newDiagram.Version = currDiagram.Version
newDiagram.Update
CopyDiagramObjects currDiagram, newDiagram
CopyDiagramLinks currDiagram, newDiagram
CopyDiagramSwimlanes currDiagram, newDiagram
set CopyElementDiagram = newDiagram
end function
sub CopyDiagramObjects( currDiagram, newDiagram)
dim currDiagramObject as EA.DiagramObject
if currDiagram.DiagramObjects.Count > 0 then
Session.Output String( 6, ".") & "Objects"
for each currDiagramObject in currDiagram.DiagramObjects CopyDiagramObject currDiagramObject, newDiagram next
newDiagram.DiagramObjects.Refresh
end if
end sub
sub CopyDiagramLinks( currDiagram, newDiagram)
dim currLink as EA.DiagramLink dim newLink as EA.DiagramLink
if currDiagram.DiagramLinks.Count > 0 then
Session.Output String( 6, ".") & "Links"
for each currLink in currDiagram.DiagramLinks
set newLink = CopyDiagramLink( currLink, newDiagram)
newLink.Update
next
newDiagram.DiagramLinks.Refresh
end if
end sub
sub CopyDiagramSwimlanes( currDiagram, newDiagram)
dim currSwimlane ' as EA.Swimlane
newDiagram.SwimlaneDef.Bold = currDiagram.SwimlaneDef.Bold newDiagram.SwimlaneDef.FontColor = currDiagram.SwimlaneDef.FontColor newDiagram.SwimlaneDef.HideClassifier = currDiagram.SwimlaneDef.HideClassifier newDiagram.SwimlaneDef.HideNames = currDiagram.SwimlaneDef.HideNames newDiagram.SwimlaneDef.LineColor = currDiagram.SwimlaneDef.LineColor newDiagram.SwimlaneDef.LineWidth = currDiagram.SwimlaneDef.LineWidth newDiagram.SwimlaneDef.Locked = currDiagram.SwimlaneDef.Locked newDiagram.SwimlaneDef.Orientation = currDiagram.SwimlaneDef.Orientation newDiagram.SwimlaneDef.ShowInTitleBar = currDiagram.SwimlaneDef.ShowInTitleBar
if currDiagram.SwimlaneDef.Swimlanes.Count > 0 then
Session.Output String( 6, ".") & "Swimlanes"
for each currSwimlane in currDiagram.SwimlaneDef.Swimlanes CopyDiagramSwimlane currSwimlane, newDiagram next
newDiagram.Update
end if
end sub
sub CopyDiagramSwimlane( currSwimlane, newDiagram)
dim newSwimlane ' as EA.Swimlane
set newSwimlane = newDiagram.SwimlaneDef.Swimlanes.Add( currSwimlane.Title, currSwimlane.Width)
newSwimlane.BackColor = currSwimlane.BackColor newSwimlane.ClassifierGuid = currSwimlane.ClassifierGuid
end sub

Column.name: Notes
Column.value: <Script Name="Report External Package Dependencies (Details)" Type="Internal" Language="VBScript"/>

Column.name: Script
Column.value:
option explicit
!INC Local Scripts.EAConstants-VBScript
dim m_packageHierarchyList 'as Scripting.Dictionary dim m_extPackageConnList 'as Scripting.Dictionary
sub OnProjectBrowserScript()
dim treeSelectedType dim package as EA.Package
treeSelectedType = Repository.GetTreeSelectedItemType()
select case treeSelectedType
case otPackage
set package = Repository.GetTreeSelectedObject()
startReportExternalPackageDependencies package
case else Session.Prompt "This script does not support items of this type.", promptOK end select
end sub
sub startReportExternalPackageDependencies( package)
dim packageHierarchyList ' as Scripting.Dictionary
set m_packageHierarchyList = CreateObject( "Scripting.Dictionary") set m_extPackageConnList = CreateObject( "Scripting.Dictionary")
Session.Output "Report External Package Dependencies (Details)"
Session.Output "- Building package hierarchy list..." buildPackageHierarchyList package
checkPackage package
end sub
sub checkPackage( package)
dim element as EA.Element dim childPackage as EA.Package
Session.Output "- Checking package " & package.Name
checkElement package.Element
for each element in package.Elements checkElement element next
for each childPackage in package.Packages checkPackage childPackage next
reportConnectors package
end sub
sub reportConnectors( package)
dim connector as EA.Connector dim sourceElement as EA.Element dim targetElement as EA.Element dim sourcePackageID 'as Integer dim targetPackageID 'as Integer dim connDirection 'as String dim relatedElement as EA.Element dim connElementList 'as EA.Connector() dim sourcePackage as EA.Package dim targetPackage as EA.Package
Session.output vbCRLF
if m_extPackageConnList.Count = 0 then Session.Output "'" & package.Name & "': There are no external package dependencies for any elements." else
Session.Output "'" & package.Name & "' External Package Dependencies"
connElementList = m_extPackageConnList.Items
for each connector in connElementList
set sourceElement = Repository.GetElementByID( connector.ClientID) set targetElement = Repository.GetElementByID( connector.SupplierID)
sourcePackageID = sourceElement.PackageID targetPackageID = targetElement.PackageID
if m_packageHierarchyList.Exists( sourcePackageID) = false then connDirection = "<- FROM" else connDirection = "TO ->" end if
set sourcePackage = Repository.GetPackageByID( sourcePackageID) set targetPackage = Repository.GetPackageByID( targetPackageID)
Session.Output "- " & sourcePackage.Element.FQName & ":" & sourceElement.Name & " " & connDirection & " " & targetPackage.Name & ":" & targetElement.Name
next
end if
end sub
sub checkElement( element)
dim childElement as EA.Element dim connector as EA.Connector
for each connector in element.Connectors checkConnector element, connector next
for each childElement in element.Elements checkElement childElement next
end sub
sub checkConnector( element, connector)
dim relatedElementID 'as Integer dim relatedElement as EA.Element dim relatedPackageID 'as Integer
if element.ElementID = connector.ClientID then relatedElementID = connector.SupplierID else relatedElementID = connector.ClientID end if
set relatedElement = Repository.GetElementByID( relatedElementID)
relatedPackageID = relatedElement.PackageID
if m_packageHierarchyList.Exists( relatedPackageID) = false then m_extPackageConnList.Add connector.ConnectorID, connector end if
end sub
sub buildPackageHierarchyList( package)
dim childPackage as EA.Package
m_packageHierarchyList.Add package.PackageID, package
for each childPackage in package.Packages buildPackageHierarchyList childPackage next
end sub

packageGUID = "{43574089-F19F-43cd-AA71-9DC435BFCB6B}"
set package = Repository.GetPackageByGuid( packageGUID)
startReportExternalPackageDependencies package
end sub

' Copyright (c) 2011-2019 Sparx Services North America. All rights reserved. www.sparxsystems.us
!INC Local Scripts.EAConstants-VBScript !INC BIZBOK Diagram Utility Scripts.Create Nested Hierarchy Diagram !INC BIZBOK Diagram Utility Scripts.Color Constants
sub OnProjectBrowserScript()
dim treeSelectedType dim package as EA.Package dim levelList ' as Dictionary(Of HierarchyLevel) dim element as EA.Element dim subElement as EA.Element
treeSelectedType = Repository.GetTreeSelectedItemType()
select case treeSelectedType
case otPackage
set package = Repository.GetTreeSelectedObject()
set levelList = getDiagramLevelList
' for each element in package.Elements ' for each subElement in element.Elements ' if subElement.MetaType = "TMF DMM Dimension" then createNestedHierarchyDiagram package, levelList, "Custom", false ' end if ' next ' next
case else
Session.Prompt "This script does not support items of this type.", promptOK
end select
end sub
OnProjectBrowserScript 'test "{66A70E55-2B99-4e54-8893-B0D7224818DD}"
sub Test(packageGUID)
dim package As EA.Package dim levelList ' as Dictionary(Of HierarchyLevel) dim element as EA.Element dim subElement as EA.Element
set package = Repository.GetPackageByGuid(packageGUID)
set levelList = getDiagramLevelList
for each element in package.Elements for each subElement in element.Elements if subElement.MetaType = "TMF DMM Dimension" then createNestedHierarchyDiagram subElement, levelList, "Custom", false end if next next
end sub
function getDiagramLevelList
dim levelList ' as Scripting.Dictionary(Of HierarchyLevel) dim level1 ' as HierarchyLevel dim level2 ' as HierarchyLevel dim level3 ' as HierarchyLevel dim level4 ' as HierarchyLevel
set levelList = CreateObject("Scripting.Dictionary")
' *** FIRST LEVEL ***
set level1 = New HierarchyLevel
level1.numObjects = 1 level1.flowDirection = LEFT_RIGHT_FLOW_DIRECTION level1.elementMetatype = "WorkPackage" level1.objectHeight = 90 level1.objectWidth = 330 level1.horizOffset = 10 level1.horizSpace = 10 level1.vertOffset = 10 level1.vertSpace = 10
level1.objectstyle.fillColor = colorLightSkyBlue level1.objectStyle.fontName = "Calibri" level1.objectStyle.fontSize = 14 level1.objectStyle.fontBold = "1" ' true
levelList.Add 1, level1
set level2 = new hierarchylevel
level2.numobjects = 2 level2.flowdirection = LEFT_RIGHT_FLOW_DIRECTION level2.elementMetatype = "WorkPackage" level2.objectHeight = 50 level2.objectWidth = 150 level2.horizOffset = 10 level2.horizSpace = 10 level2.vertOffset = 50 level2.vertSpace = 10
level2.objectstyle.fillColor = colorDeepSkyBlue level2.objectstyle.fontName = "Calibri" level2.objectstyle.fontSize = 12 level2.objectStyle.fontBold = "1" ' true
levellist.add 2, level2
set level3 = new hierarchylevel
level3.numobjects = 4 level3.flowdirection = LEFT_RIGHT_FLOW_DIRECTION level3.elementMetatype = "WorkPackage" level3.objectHeight = 50 level3.objectWidth = 150 level3.horizOffset = 10 level3.horizSpace = 10 level3.vertOffset = 50 level3.vertSpace = 10
level3.objectstyle.fillColor = colorBlue level3.objectstyle.fontName = "Calibri" level3.objectstyle.fontSize = 10 level3.objectstyle.fontColor = colorWhite level3.objectStyle.fontBold = "1" ' true
levellist.add 3, level3
set getDiagramLevelList = levelList
end function

Column.name: Notes
Column.value: <Script Name="Report External Package Dependencies (Summary)" Type="Internal" Language="VBScript"/>

Column.name: Script
Column.value:
option explicit
!INC Local Scripts.EAConstants-VBScript !INC SSNA Diagram Script Utilities.Set Current Diagram Objects Style
dim m_packageHierarchyList 'as Scripting.Dictionary dim m_extPackageList 'as Scripting.Dictionary
const PACKAGE_WIDTH = 130 const PACKAGE_HEIGHT = 80 const PACKAGE_OFFSET = 20 const PACKAGE_HORIZ_SPACING = 20 const PACKAGE_VERT_SPACING = 150
sub OnProjectBrowserScript()
dim treeSelectedType dim package as EA.Package
treeSelectedType = Repository.GetTreeSelectedItemType()
select case treeSelectedType
case otPackage
set package = Repository.GetTreeSelectedObject()
startReportExternalPackageDependencies package
case else Session.Prompt "This script does not support items of this type.", promptOK end select
end sub
sub startReportExternalPackageDependencies( package)
dim packageHierarchyList ' as Scripting.Dictionary
set m_packageHierarchyList = CreateObject( "Scripting.Dictionary") set m_extPackageList = CreateObject( "Scripting.Dictionary")
Session.Output "Report External Package Dependencies (Summary)"
Session.Output "- Building package hierarchy list..."
buildPackageHierarchyList package
deletePackageDependencies package
checkPackage package
reportPackages package
end sub
sub checkPackage( package)
dim element as EA.Element dim childPackage as EA.Package
Session.Output "- Checking package " & package.Name
checkElement package.Element
for each element in package.Elements checkElement element next
for each childPackage in package.Packages checkPackage childPackage next
end sub
sub reportPackages( package)
dim packageDiagram as EA.Diagram dim diagramObject as EA.DiagramObject dim dependConn as EA.Connector dim packageList 'as List( Of EA.Package) dim packageIndex 'as Integer dim packageKeyList 'as Object() dim packageKey 'as String dim extPackage as EA.Package dim connDirection 'as String dim extPackageElement as EA.Element dim fqName 'as String dim prevPackageRight 'as Integer
Session.output vbCRLF
if m_extPackageList.Count = 0 then Session.Output "'" & package.Name & "': There are no external package dependencies for any elements." else
Session.Output "'" & package.Name & "' External Package Dependencies"
set packageDiagram = package.Diagrams.AddNew("Package Dependencies", "Package")
packageDiagram.ShowPackageContents = false packageDiagram.StyleEx = UpdateStyleList( packageDiagram.StyleEx, "ShowFQN=1") packageDiagram.Update
set diagramObject = packageDiagram.DiagramObjects.AddNew( "", "")
diagramObject.ElementID = package.Element.ElementID diagramObject.left = PACKAGE_OFFSET diagramObject.top = - PACKAGE_OFFSET diagramObject.right = diagramObject.left + PACKAGE_WIDTH diagramObject.bottom = diagramObject.top - PACKAGE_HEIGHT
diagramObject.Update
prevPackageRight = 0
packageKeyList = m_extPackageList.Keys
for packageIndex = 0 to m_extPackageList.Count - 1
packageKey = packageKeyList( packageIndex)
set extPackage = m_extPackageList.Item( packageKey) set extPackageElement = Repository.GetElementByGuid( extPackage.PackageGUID)
connDirection = Mid( packageKey, InStr( packageKey, ":") + 1)
fqName = Repository.GetFormattedName( extPackage.PackageGUID, &H01 or &H02 or &H04 or &H08 or &H10 or &H20 or &H40 or &H80 , "::", 0)
Session.Output "- " & connDirection & " '" & extPackage.Name & "' (" & fqName & ")"
set dependConn = package.Element.Connectors.AddNew( "", "Package")
if connDirection = "TO" then dependConn.ClientID = package.Element.ElementID dependConn.SupplierID = extPackageElement.ElementID else dependConn.ClientID = extPackageElement.ElementID dependConn.SupplierID = package.Element.ElementID end if
dependConn.Stereotype = "import"
dependConn.Update
set diagramObject = packageDiagram.DiagramObjects.AddNew( "", "")
diagramObject.ElementID = extPackageElement.ElementID diagramObject.left = prevPackageRight + PACKAGE_OFFSET + PACKAGE_HORIZ_SPACING diagramObject.top = - PACKAGE_OFFSET - PACKAGE_HEIGHT - PACKAGE_VERT_SPACING diagramObject.right = diagramObject.left + PACKAGE_WIDTH diagramObject.bottom = diagramObject.top - PACKAGE_HEIGHT
diagramObject.Update packageDiagram.Update
Repository.ReloadDiagram packageDiagram.DiagramID
prevPackageRight = diagramObject.right
next
Repository.SaveDiagram packageDiagram.DiagramID
end if
end sub
sub deletePackageDependencies( package)
dim conn as EA.Connector dim connIndex 'as Integer
for connIndex = package.Connectors.Count - 1 to 0 step -1
set conn = package.Connectors.GetAt( connIndex)
if conn.Type = "Package" and conn.Stereotype = "import" then package.Connectors.Delete( connIndex) end if
next
package.Update
end sub
sub checkElement( element)
dim childElement as EA.Element dim connector as EA.Connector
Session.Output " + " & element.Name
for each connector in element.Connectors checkConnector element, connector next
for each childElement in element.Elements checkElement childElement next
end sub
sub checkConnector( element, connector)
dim relatedElementID 'as Integer dim relatedElement as EA.Element dim relatedPackageID 'as Integer dim relatedPackage as EA.Package dim connDirection 'as String dim packageKey 'as String
if element.ElementID = connector.ClientID then relatedElementID = connector.SupplierID connDirection = "TO" else relatedElementID = connector.ClientID connDirection = "FROM" end if
Session.Output " -> " & connector.ConnectorGUID & " " & connDirection & " " & relatedElementID
set relatedElement = Repository.GetElementByID( relatedElementID)
relatedPackageID = relatedElement.PackageID
if m_packageHierarchyList.Exists( relatedPackageID) = false then
packageKey = CStr(relatedPackageID) & ":" & connDirection
if m_extPackageList.Exists( packageKey) = false then
set relatedPackage = Repository.GetPackageByID( relatedPackageID)
m_extPackageList.Add packageKey, relatedPackage
end if
end if
end sub
sub buildPackageHierarchyList( package)
dim childPackage as EA.Package
m_packageHierarchyList.Add package.PackageID, package
for each childPackage in package.Packages buildPackageHierarchyList childPackage next
end sub

packageGUID = "{43574089-F19F-43cd-AA71-9DC435BFCB6B}"
set package = Repository.GetPackageByGuid( packageGUID)
startReportExternalPackageDependencies package
end sub

Column.name: Notes
Column.value: <Script Name="TAM -> Create Application Map" Type="Internal" Language="VBScript"/>

Column.name: Script
Column.value:
option explicit
' Copyright (c) 2019 Sparx Services North America. www.sparxsystems.us
!INC Local Scripts.EAConstants-VBScript !INC BIZBOK Report Scripts.Report Script Library !INC SSNA Diagram Script Utilities.Color Constants !INC SSNA Diagram Script Utilities.Set Current Diagram Objects Style !INC SSNA Diagram Script Utilities.Clone Routines
dim m_sqlStringTemplate 'as String dim m_countryCode 'as String
const APP_PACKAGE_ID = 5182 const SCALING_FACTOR = 2
const SOLID_FILL_BORDER_STYLE = 0 const SOLID_NOFILL_BORDER_STYLE = 3 const LINE_HEIGHT = 13 ' 8pt font = 13 pixels tall const TEXT_BOX_MARGIN = 5 ' 8pt font = 5 pixels top & bottom const PIXELS_PER_CHAR = 5 ' 8pt font = 5 pixels wide
sub createTAMApplicationMap( packageGUID, templateDiagramGUID, sqlElementGUID, diagramSuffix)
dim templateDiagram as EA.Diagram dim newDiagram as EA.Diagram dim package as EA.Package dim diagramObject as EA.DiagramObject dim elementID 'as Integer dim element as EA.Element dim customStyleList 'as String
m_sqlStringTemplate = GetMappedApplicationsSQLString( sqlElementGUID) set templateDiagram = Repository.GetDiagramByGuid( templateDiagramGUID) set package = Repository.GetPackageByGUID( packageGUID)
Session.Output "Copying template diagram..."
set newDiagram = CopyElementDiagram( templateDiagram, package)
newDiagram.Name = newDiagram.Name & " " & diagramSuffix
Session.Output "Scaling diagram..."
ScaleDiagram newDiagram, SCALING_FACTOR
Session.Output "Add Applications to TAM Diagram '" & newDiagram.name & "'"
for each diagramObject in newDiagram.DiagramObjects
elementID = diagramObject.ElementID set element = Repository.GetElementByID( elementID) Session.Output "Processing diagram element '" & element.Name & "' " & element.Stereotype customStyleList = "SSJ=12:" ' Name - Top Center
setDiagramObjectCustomStyle newDiagram, diagramObject, customStyleList
if element.Stereotype = "TMF_Application" then updateDiagramObject package, newDiagram, diagramObject, element end if
next
newDiagram.StyleEx = UpdateStyleList( newDiagram.StyleEx, "DSO=1") newDiagram.ExtendedStyle = UpdateStyleList( newDiagram.ExtendedStyle, "HideEStereo=1") newDiagram.Update Repository.ReloadDiagram newDiagram.DiagramID
Session.Output "Finished!"
end sub
sub updateDiagramObject( package, diagram, diagramObject, element)
dim boundaryElement as EA.Element dim boundaryObject as EA.DiagramObject dim boundaryStyleList 'as String dim completeAppList 'as Scripting.Dictionary dim appNameList 'as Scripting.Dictionary dim appNameKeys 'as String() dim appArray 'as Object() dim application as EA.Element dim appCount 'as Integer dim appName 'as String dim appNameText 'as String dim textMaxLines 'as Integer dim columnCount 'as Integer dim columnWidth 'as Integer dim columnIndex 'as Integer dim appIndex 'as Integer dim textObject as EA.DiagramObject dim textElement as EA.Element dim objIndex 'as Integer dim topOffset 'as Integer dim boundaryHeight 'as Integer dim textHeight 'as Integer dim maxTextLength 'as Integer
Session.Output "'" & element.Name & "' TAM Application"
objIndex = -1
set boundaryElement = package.Elements.AddNew( "", "Boundary")
boundaryElement.Update
setElementBorderStyle boundaryElement, SOLID_FILL_BORDER_STYLE
set boundaryObject = diagram.DiagramObjects.AddNew( "", "")
boundaryObject.ElementID = boundaryElement.ElementID boundaryObject.top = diagramObject.top - 20 boundaryObject.bottom = diagramObject.bottom + 5 boundaryObject.left = diagramObject.left + 5 boundaryObject.right = diagramObject.right - 5 boundaryObject.Sequence = objIndex
boundaryStyleList = "BCol=" & colorWhite & ";LCol=" & colorWhite
SetDiagramObjectStyleList boundaryObject, boundaryStyleList
boundaryObject.Update
objIndex = objIndex - 1
set appNameList = getMappedAppNameList( element)
appCount = appNameList.Count
if appCount > 0 then
boundaryHeight = boundaryObject.top - boundaryObject.bottom
textMaxLines = Int( ( boundaryHeight - TEXT_BOX_MARGIN ) / LINE_HEIGHT)
if textMaxLines = 0 then textMaxLines = 1 end if
textHeight = textMaxLines * LINE_HEIGHT + TEXT_BOX_MARGIN * 2
if boundaryHeight <> textHeight then topOffset = ( textHeight - boundaryHeight ) / 2 else topOffset = 0 end if
columnCount = Int( ( ( appCount - 1 ) / textMaxLines) + 1 )
Session.Output element.Name & ": appCount = " & appCount & ", textMaxLines = " & textMaxLines & ", columnCount = " & columnCount
columnWidth = Int( ( boundaryObject.right - boundaryObject.left ) / columnCount)
maxTextLength = Int( columnWidth / PIXELS_PER_CHAR)
appIndex = 0
for columnIndex = 1 to columnCount
set textElement = package.Elements.AddNew( "", "Text")
textElement.Update
set textObject = diagram.DiagramObjects.AddNew( "", "")
textObject.ElementID = textElement.ElementID textObject.top = boundaryObject.top + topOffset textObject.bottom = boundaryObject.bottom textObject.left = boundaryObject.left + ( columnIndex - 1) * columnWidth textObject.right = textObject.left + columnWidth textObject.Sequence = objIndex
textObject.Update
appNameText = ""
do
appNameKeys = appNameList.Keys()
appName = appNameKeys( appIndex)
Session.Output "- Application '" & appName & "'..."
if ( len( appName) * PIXELS_PER_CHAR ) > columnWidth then appName = Left( appName, maxTextLength - 1) & "..." end if
if appNameText = vbNullString then appNameText = appName else appNameText = appNameText & vbCRLF & appName end if
appIndex = appIndex + 1
loop until ( ( appIndex mod textMaxLines) = 0) or appIndex = appCount
textElement.Notes = appNameText
textElement.Update
objIndex = objIndex - 1
next
end if
end sub
function getMappedAppNameList( tamApp)
dim sqlString 'as String dim elementList_XML 'ss String dim elementList_XMLDoc 'as Xml.XmlDocument dim element_XMLNodeList 'as Xml.XmlNodeList dim element_XMLNode 'as Xml.XmlNode dim appNameList 'as SortedList dim childNodeList 'as Xml.XmlNodeList dim appName 'as String dim appGUID 'as String
sqlString = Replace( m_sqlStringTemplate, "%TAM_APP_GUID%", tamApp.ElementGUID) sqlString = Replace( sqlString, "%COUNTRY_CODE%", m_countryCode)
elementList_XML = Repository.SQLQuery(sqlString)
set elementList_XMLDoc = CreateObject("Microsoft.XMLDOM")
elementList_XMLDoc.LoadXml(elementList_XML)
set element_XMLNodeList = elementList_XMLDoc.SelectNodes("/EADATA/Dataset_0/Data/Row")
set appNameList = CreateObject( "Scripting.Dictionary")
for each element_XMLNode in element_XMLNodeList
set childNodeList = element_XMLNode.ChildNodes
appName = childNodeList.Item(2).Text appGUID = childNodeList.Item(3).Text
appNameList.Add appName, appGUID
next
set getMappedAppNameList = appNameList
end function
function getMappedApplicationsSQLString( sqlElementGUID)
dim sqlElement as EA.Element dim sqlString 'as String
set sqlElement = Repository.GetElementByGuid( sqlElementGUID)
sqlString = sqlElement.Notes
getMappedApplicationsSQLString = sqlString
end function
'DEPRECATED function getMappedApplicationListEA( element, parentAppList)
dim appList 'as Scripting.Dictionary dim appIndex 'as Integer dim appName 'as String dim childElement as EA.Element dim childAppList 'as Scripting.Dictionary dim childAppIndex 'as Integer dim childAppName 'as String
set appList = getSortedRelatedElementList( element, "Association", "ArchiMate_Assignment", "Component", "ArchiMate_ApplicationComponent", APP_PACKAGE_ID)
for appIndex = 0 to appList.Count - 1
appName = appList.GetKey( appIndex)
if not parentAppList.ContainsKey( appName) then parentAppList.Add appName, appList( appName) end if
next
for each childElement in element.Elements
set childAppList = getMappedApplicationList( childElement, parentAppList)
for childAppIndex = 0 to childAppList.Count - 1
childAppName = childAppList.GetKey( childAppIndex)
if not appList.ContainsKey( childAppName) then appList.Add childAppName, childAppList( childAppName) end if
next
next
set getMappedApplicationList = appList
end function
sub setElementBorderStyle( boundaryElement, borderStyle)
setElementColumnValue boundaryElement, "BorderStyle", borderStyle
end sub
sub setElementColumnValue( element, columnName, columnValue)
dim sqlString 'As String
sqlString = "UPDATE t_object SET " & columnName & "='" & columnValue & "' WHERE Object_ID = " & element.ElementID
Repository.Execute( sqlString)
element.Refresh
end sub
sub scaleDiagram( diagram, scalingFactor)
dim diagObj as EA.DiagramObject
for each diagObj in diagram.DiagramObjects
diagObj.left = diagObj.left * SCALING_FACTOR diagObj.right = diagObj.right * SCALING_FACTOR diagObj.top = diagObj.top * SCALING_FACTOR diagObj.bottom = diagObj.bottom * SCALING_FACTOR
diagObj.Update
next
Repository.ReloadDiagram diagram.DiagramID
end sub
